Blog.post: Hello all my viewers, i would like to apoligize for being me, I was rude, thus I am rude, I was cruel, thus I am cruel, I am what I am, and thus I am corrupt like the rest of our world, I tried to be pure and save myself but I couldnt, the tendrils of society seeped into my life like bad coffee through cracks in the ceiling and twisted my ideals. Throughout my whole life I have been in conrtol and have made very bad decisions, actions so grave I can never take back, I leave an impression on all those I know, and those I wish to no longer speak with bear a deep emotional scar, its there if you look. I can no longer bear the pains of this world, and am giving in quickly, only God knows how much longer I can hold out, I tried to be strong for her, but i failed. Im a hypocrite, everything i do is a lie, and my life is a lie, My eyes have been opened it wont happen again I will see to it, I can now see I live a lie and my works are foul, i no longer deserve what I get for I manipulate those around me, i tried to make the world how I liked it, I failed and must now reap the consequences of my actions, i would like you all to know that Sean is no longer, and this may be the last post. The burn has become worse, it has burrowed deep within my heart, and has consumed me whole, I bid you all farewell.

Now I have finally found a nick name for Kelly. Its VIRGIL!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!, I mean it fits her soooo well. The History of the name: In the beginning I knew her as Smurf, then no longer could i call her short. next i called her Kelly (It just worked) and now I call her Virgil

The votes are in I have decided WHAT the best gamecube game(s) is(are) Sonic Adventure Battle 2 and Bloody Roar: Primal Fury. I mean come on they are the 'Shiz"! Can you name one fighting game where there is no blood, thats right BLOODY ROAR!!!!!!!!!, as opposed to the last 3 games this game is completly lacking any blood. The game is the ultimate fighting game, I mean you can turn into a flaming penguin, WHERE ELSE CAN YOU DO THAT? HUH?HUH?HUH?HUH?HUH?, My point exactly!

!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!UPDATE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! My Cast has been Changed SIGNIFICANTLY!!!!!!! Tristian - My First girlfriend, and ultimately my last, 2.5 months. She had the biggest effect of them all, she taught me friendship, and unlocked my poetry skills. Ryan - The name of the guy that ends up going out with the girl I just broke up with....believe me, every girl I have ever had was taken by "a" ryan Ryan D. - Personally I dont know him, but apparently he IS a nice guy, if he wasn't and I were to find out,DAMN there would be HOT blood on the walls!!!!! Lexy - My second girlfriend, five minutes, I am not even going there. She lost the Our Lady Peace CD I hooked her up with, so funny because it was like 3 months ago I gave it to her, and like she just now decided to look for it Anna - My most recent girlfriend (3rd), 2 weeks (yeah im getting up pretty high now), Actually to be honest I have gotten past that whole "lust" thing (YOU KNOW WHAT I MEaN!!!!!!!), I mean i can think about her and like not "think" about her at the same time Kelly - My first friend that i met when i moved here, we have been through tough and good times, she moved away this summer, i knew her 3 yrs...we still keep in contact Allie H. - At first a friend of my sister, but I got to know her. I have been there for her, and her for me, one of my closer friends that I respect. Yeah, i have guided her through the art of releasing angry energy through Poetry, She has come so far. Becca - A friend that helped end the Reprise of the "Twisted Path" and "The Shadows' calling" chapters, she helped calm my anger and sadness Jimmy - One of my closest, and best friends, he introduced me to warhammer, and the vast collection of Stephen King. Tim - For about 3 months during "Forbidden Love" i valued his advice, he had to offer Jeff - Another of my close friends, he has always been there for me, he's also an accomplished musician Shauna - A new friend, and possibly a key player in the next chapter of my life. She has a heart for God, and has had some good advice Makenzie - Also a new friend, Brad's girlfriend. She's into some horror movies, so she's my unnoficial movie critic Brad - Key factor in the next chapter. Even though he's 2 months older, I took him under my wing and consider him my younger brother. He like Tris and me is a dedicated fan of Brak, Prozzak, and Our Lady Peace Katrina - New comer to my life, she quickly became close as a friend, and i greatly respect her for her judgement and advice David - neighbour, friend, He was the one who tried to purify me, sadly he failed....lol....Anna succeeded... =) (Doing absolutely nothing but being ANNA!), He also has a wealth of knowledge to give, if he could only figure out that it is there, and get his mind of his guns and knives. Chase - Allie's "unofficial" Boyfriend....Yeah right....anyways, I do not know him yet, but if he is reading this, I will have you know, if you hurt Allie, you are asking for it. Anna's Grandmother - I look to her as a Spiritual support, and a wealth of knowledge, she is so kind to me. If you are reading, Thank you. Danielle / Anna Mae - Brad's older sis, as she would put it she is the "Shiz". She works at subway, which makes her the cat's pyjama's.
Well, now I am posting LIVE from Anna's House. Yeah, my point exactly. Hmmn, yeah. Steak, mnnmmmmmmmnnnn!
IDEA!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! I may begin to remix some old-school videogame music into my techno music!!!!

Just got off the phone with Allie. She's cool, I kinda miss seeing her around and stuff. With College and all I have to really change my priorities. I mean I no longer have time for anime, warhammer, computer gaming, movies, "secular" music, etc. and thanks to Anna I really have no "need" for them any more, sometimes I think that maybe God sent her to open my eyes to what was really going and to the fact that maybe, just maybe I was going about living my life the wrong way, she showed me I was, and I thank God so much she was there for me. I really enjoy spending time with her, learning about her, and learning the wisdom and knowledge her Grandmother has, so much wisdom, so much knowledge. I thank God for them both, so much. I just sit there and wonder what would have happened if I had never asked for her number, hmmn, nah bad thought. I would have been so bored this summer. and Anna if you are reading this, thanks for calling me back even though I was half asleep and in the middle of breakfast. :) Mmmnnn, Eggs, hash browns, Toast, mmmn, salt, mmnnnn, pepper.

Well, I just found out what destroyed my vision.....not quite Satan, but I will give him some very little undeserved credit for doing so. Nintendo's creation, which they so happened to BEAT into the dust, Virtual Boy. It was only one of the coolest systems out there complete with stereo vision, and stereo sound. Not intended for the age of 7 yrs or younger, I never read the section of the book before, so now I am abnormally angered toward my abounding stupidity back then, I will go while I think about how I destroyed my vision.

Hmmn, so if the lack of heavenly wisdom is the result of the power of demonic wisdom, then does that mean that human, natural, instinct is really demonic wisdom and demonic in nature. Thus showing our Angelic roots. So confusing that man is angelic these days, thats why the Holy spirit can have trouble entering our hearts and minds. Today in church, a thought passed my mind, so if the HIV virus were to be harnessed correctly, you know extracting the virus and all, and the bio-luminescent gene from either bottom-dweller fish or fire-flies inserted in with blood protein, we could technically have glow in the dark blood. No apparent value to our lives, but i mean you could cut yourself to open a dark room up.

Calculus will be fun this year, God blessed me last year with a good teacher, I pray that this year I may be as lucky. The burning in my eyes, the pain in my heart, something is wrong, somethign I can not find.

Well, I am here again. Anna came and visited with us for a day, that was way cool, sadly even when she is there, I am still disrespectfulto those nearby. I am not sure why, stupid demonic inspiration, thats the way I look at it now, if it aint of God, its demonic. Stupid demons, not my fault they are looked after by Abaddon. I wonder if he has a temper, and like beats them for fun? I have no idea, just a twisted thought based on my twisted past. Then again I should not complain, I mean I got both my parents, and I am a Christian. I guess that means I am better off then some people, so I am assuming that I have no right complaining about my life. Well you would have never guessed it, but Anna has convinced me to get out of Anime, I mean my life was resting on it, so she helped saved my eternity. Though little did I know that this lack of Anime would drive me mad. I mean, I spent the majority of my life (and money) on anime, and look at it now, behind me and out of my life? So this means that I wasted that portion of my life, all that time, that I will never get back, all the predicaments I found myself in that are now vain. All the sacrifices I made mean nothing. As stated yesterday, very little matters to me anymore, I am now officially sick of console systems, let alone computer games. As far back as I can remember I loved computer games, but now, they seem so "boring" no point. Ryan is back, and reality is taken its toll on my life again, back to rigorous calculus exercises and school 18 hrs a day. I view Ryan as a harbringer that will haunt my life, but then again our words affect our outcomes, so my question is WHY RYAN, I mean its better than Chester or Floyd, but i dont know anymore. Sometimes if it were not for either 1. God, 2. Anna (in that order, I always go to God, first he always comes through) I would cease to have a will to live on. Anna, if your reading this.....I love you and God loves you. Well as for the rest of you God bless.

Well, Looks like i report here once again, sadly not too much new news, though this summer thing is beginning to wear on me. ARGGGGGGGGGGGGGHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!1 why must we humans be so fickle and corrupted with demonic wisdom, I mean, we want something and when we get it we get bored, and then want something else. I can under stand why lazy people are happy with their lives. I seem no longer to be contempt, with this summer, the heat, the anguish, the pain, the bitterness, I cannot take it, Sometimes if it werent for God, and my commitment to Anna, I would just die. "Life what is it a solid or a liquid" - Mars Ill (i think), makes you think, is all we do in vain, or maybe really worth it. What about that kid in your class that everyone looks up to, ever think about why? unless they talk to God, they are probably filled with demonic wisdom, these spirits, I dont know some times. or Perhaps why it took forever for David and my Mom to convince of my bad ways, i mean, how was Anna able to do right away, i dont really know. This year all i have in mind is God, School, God, Anna. Maybe its sinful that I didnt list my family their, but I love them, even though im way uber rude sometimes. Isn't it amazing how family is always there for you, and so understanding. With everything i have learned about the human nature my family continues to confound me, i mean i go and get in like a major amount of trouble with them, and like they pardon me, i mean human nature cannot allow that or can it? how can they continue to love me even when i have directly sinned against them. Just because i am their flesh and blood? You know how the mapped the human genome and all, well I will challenge them to find what part of our DNA that the angel code resides in, i mean do angels have dna? or was our birth like a "spiritual infection," like a kind of Alien Resurrection style thingy going on. So like how big would one of these Nephalim be i mean, they were huge, and like Goliath was like a shorter Nephalim. If scientists are so smart can they mimic emotion, I truly doubt it, i mean emotion is based on experiences, and I really dont think that computers can get those, It would take far too long to explain the code for basic comprehension let alone a whole mind. Well, it turns out they went ahead and capitilized on my idea of a low frequency disruption cannon. HARP project if you care. Another idea of mine was like Bio-thermal energy, some how converting body heat, amplifying it, creating steam, using the steam in turbines, thus energy. Who knows may already be invented.

Well the other night I did the unthinkable, I of all people tried fish. I mean that was a fish like no other, It was like a Chicken in a Salmon Suit, or rather a chicken in salmon's clothes. But anyways, I went by Anna's place, I admire her so much, and I thank her for being there for me, I am so happy I have a friendship with her, we can sit there and talk on an eye to eye level, its amazing how intelligent she is, her mind is full of possibilities, she could do anything she wanted. As for Anna, I would like to thank her for trusting me, that trust which I will never betray, Has helped keep me inline, Thank you Anna, and Adios.

hhhhmmmmmmmmn Thought for the day: Suppose I had 2 cows, and 1 in 2 cows was a winner, and I sold the "winning" cow without realizing it was a winner, does the 1 out of 2 cows ideal still apply to the remaining cow, or does it become 100 % of cows are losers? anyways, for all you people still tuned in, I will be receiving the Evangelion on Dvd soon. Nice, i know. Any interested in that marathon contact me, I will be having the marathons during winter break. Anyways Evangelion should be clean except for an implied "room at night" scene, anyways. God Bless you all!

After a day of long searching I have finally come upon a list of SAFE anime, but for some odd reason, all anime seem to have a "shower" scene, Why this is, we will never know. Maybe it was some sort of ploy to exhaust cartoon water supplies, or rather the color BLUE. Sometimes I ponder about the difference between American and Japanese animation, Japanese is either totally brutal, or totally cute, American animation likes to straddle this fence, not sure why, Dang melting pot of unrighteous glory.

Hmmn Considerign the values of our nation, and our current standing in the world, no one knows when Armageddon may occur. Its astonishing as to how many people you will yelling and screaming that are God, in the streets, some times drug addicts enervate me. I mean look at them, so void and oblivious to our world and its socio-economic standing, not caring as to when doomsday will be, but rather when they will get their next high, and not how or why. Satan has stirred quite a congregation, I mean he's getting desperate, thousands of years of experience and madness/exile backing that foul creation. People say armageddon is near, but we dont know, the Anti-Christ may or may not have been born yet. Remember that he prob wont rise to power till about 30 yrs old, this will be a glorious day in hell, as far as the Un-Saved are concerned this "prince" will simply be a modern day equivalent version of Jesus, doing exactly (Cept Salvation) what he did. How Satan has tried many times to damn humanity. 1. Tempting of Man 2. Nephalem 3. Tower of Babylon 4. The creation of idolatry 5. and many things to come One Day, one day "That all men might see the truth and know the way to heaven"

Well today is a good day, Two more of my music videos have been completed Krwling, and 1stp Klosr. Using my newly bought copy of Spawn, I have brought these songs to life. Krwling was based upon the death of Al Simmons, and ultimately the birth of Spawn. I have now successfully seen all but 2 episodes of Invader Zim, my brain throbs. Kinda like that one time i had my southpark marathon, that was dangerous, had some hazardous effects on my skin and/ or eyes, not to mention mind. Ack, for one week i was breathing Trey Parker. Speaking of dangerously addictive, cartoon marathons, while I was in Cali, I watched the week long Daria marathon, i was monoton(e)ic for a long while. Coming September 24, this year, I will be having my first Gundam Wing 20hr marathon, any interested please contact me, YOU know how, and where to contact me. This will be a dangerous marathon, ending with the film "Endless Waltz," The final gundam wing film, we may even have a Gundam Battle Assault 2 Psx Tourney. With Anna's help I have now found out the list of the top somethign Superheros: 1. Power Puff Girls 2. Superman 3. Spawn 4. Batman 5. Spiderman

Well went much brighter. Jeff spent the night twice, that was neato. And we rented Spawn, that movie kicks butt and everyone should watch it sooner or later. On the other hand Anna called and actually talked to me without putting me off on hold, she was really nice to talk to. We talked for awhile about life and she said a few things that really helped me release what little anger I had toward her, she's happy with her life and im content that she is! Well life's good here, Night all you. God Bless.

People, Guess What? I did the impossible, I did my own wash. Well ya, but I also made an Invader Zim music video using a Herring, no X-ecutioner style by The X-Ecutioner & Black Thought and Mr. Hahn. It turned quite nicely actually, email me if ya want to see it sometime. :)

Well today turned out pretty nicely, a far better turnout than yesterday. I mean I watched about 6 recorded episodes of "Invader Zim." Makes you think, whatever happened to that show, I would not mind getting a few of those episodes on DVD or somthing. I mean if any of you can hook me up, then hook me up. :). Wasnt it funny how Zim could never take over the world without Gaz, Dib, or his "Faithful" robot/dog Gir getting in the way. Sometimes I wonder as to why I watch the Television programming I do. I mean i watch strange stuff, some personal faves are: (In order) Invader Zim Ren and Stimpy Robotech Southpark Dragon Ball Daria Macross Spawn Tales from the crypt I mean mostly animated, but like what am i supposed to watch? its a calming break from reality

Well turns out my crew and I have decided to restructure the internal workings of our Computer game, and are dividing the team into Story mode operators, and mulitplay developers. Like any of you care..lol. But if any interested give me a buzz.

Well thats it for my Tristian chapter of my life. I am over her, I was holding on until I had met Ryan. I did, so I decided I could care less as to what she does now, and whether or not shes happy with life. Well this is one of my many chapters of my life, this one in particular is part of the dark chapters. Dark Chapters (Chronological to some extent oldest to newest): A Twisted Path - My obsession with Ren and Stimpy, and Tales from the crypt, that warped my views of reality Their Twisted Ideals - Point in my childhood when i was repeatedly harrassed at school, tormenting and beating me. I eventually snapped Shifting Paths - Time when when my Grandfather became ill, we moved alot, he died, and we relocated to Washington The Shadows' Calling - A period of time in which Nightmares plagued my dreams, part of this period intertwined with the Forbidden Love chapter. Meeting Jamie, unlocked my ability to understand the irony of my relationship between my life and my dreams. A New Friend - Time in which I met Kelly, we got close as friends. Later due to my errors we grew apart, she moved at the tailend of Forbidden Love, since then we have gotten closer Forbidden Love - Tristian, Anna, and Ryan Inc....and burning anger toward my parents. Tristian unlocked my ability of poetry, perhaps the only good part of this chapter.
Well I was just looking at a banner ad.....The best and worst dressed at some awards thing, that right there is proof that we live in a vain culture.....guess thats my insight for the day...

These two poems were written later the night I met Ryan, and were addressed at Tristian: ----------------------------------------------------------------- What was left of your shattered self is gone, leaving me here alone, to suffer in the cold, memories of you, fractured dreams left to agonize, no longer needed, or wanted, I remain The joy I had, is gone, to see the knowledge that they bore, the atmosphere filled with hate, downtrodden, I remain My last hope destroyed, my joy now gone, I no longer wish, I no longer hope, that memory is gone, it has died, I remain Those who are there, request too much, and expect too little, feelings of animosity rise then fall, I failed to stand, I remain The memories will not return, my decision was the factor, I caused this, I allowed this, no longer needed, I remain? ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- You sit there, happy in your world, I allowed it, or Did I? I was happy at first, to you smile, to see your face, I tried, it brought joy to my heart, stabbed in my back, I fell, starving, forced to dine on my own blood, to consume my own life In the aftermath, he is always present, always watching, punctual, waiting, and ready, to see me fail, and take my place, erasing my memories The nightmares beckon, once again they call, I may return, the shadows' will, too strong to resist, echoing in my mind I hope your happy, I really do, I thought I tried, I hope you are happy, I can take it no longer, one day my friend, I guess this is goodbye -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Well anyone who has gotten to know me will know that I write poetry, and I thank 2 people for it. God for giving it to me, and Tristian for unlocking it. Here is my current stockhold of my poetry. (Note: they aint in any kind of order) ------------------------------------------------------------ Why do I live in this flesh shell that I hate, Which daemons try to steal and take, This brain I have, how do I know it is there, I do not see it, And search in despair... for an answer, Where it lies I cannot see, For the answer, it lives inside of me, Not in the brain, but in the mind, Which has taken me so long to find, And when I do, I realize, That it is no longer an object, But a concept on which I have wasted time, The mind resides in the soul, With untold rage and with no control, It lashes out to maim, But fails in its cruel and twisted game, Only with a maiden's voice can it be tamed, But even then there lies no remain, Of this thing they call a brain ------------------------------------------------------------------ Happiness and joys on earth are lies, Merely visions in man's clouded eyes, Which are always lies, Life is bleak, Death is vast, What's wrong, what's right, Memories past, Nothing is left, All is gone, How can you stop that which you have begun ------------------------------------------------------------------- Shames and sorrows swallow us whole, into a void-like black hole, that is life, cutting through you like a knife, worlds split in two, to be with you, shattering like bone, to resist that which draws us apart, like a needle on a dart, drawing blood as it goes, drawing and taking to where noone knows, where no energy flows, darkness consuming us all, as death, vengeance, and lust steal souls, Daemons value them as gold, they trap the souls that are sold, in the icy grip of death, that causes us to part ---------------------------------------------------------------------- Worlds falling, death stalling, daemon's laughter, and people's screams, agonizing pains, hideous laughter, needless suffering, and deaths in vain, everlasting pains, longing to be maimed, death is simple, life is hard, so addicted to the black art, end it all with a knife in your heart, remembering in death, everything from the start, then you will be complete ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- In life you miss, Death is bliss, Life is bad, Death is sad, Nothing's right, Nothing's wrong, Why for earthly desires do we long, Death is good, Death is Had, Why do we long memories had, Memories are old, Souls were sold, For worthless gold, The gold is gone when we depart, So why do we make it the desire of our heart, It embittered us all, And it will lead us to our fall ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Death, emptiness, and woes surround us, Like shadows in the day, We like to hide these torments like shadows in the night, Unseen they are, but there they be, Death, pictures of thousands of lost souls, Burning or living, none will know, But only in one's death do you find the answers that you seek, Where you will find the one that is not weak, Woes of the past torment us in the day, While we hide them in the night with only a tear to stay, Emptiness, sadness, and the lack of self worth, Trying to hide them becomes ones undoing into the bitter earth, Until one's bitter end you will stay, Seeking answers along the way, About which none will say, Until that bitter day ------------------------------------------------------------------------- Creature lurking in the night, That are your fears causing you to fight, Voices in your head, Make you want to be dead, But when all is said, Nothing is done, Fears causing you to run, To run from life, Causing you to reach for a knife, And make it end, Life is painful, Death is painless, Waiting for it in utter silence, Thoughts to atone for, Causing you to want it forever more ----------------------------------------------------------------- Autumn, leaves falling, daemons crawling, rats gnawing and cats clawing, I am lost in this world, so confused, so confused the spirits are becoming amused, their energies gathering, wounds festering, their questions become pestering, in this world. ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Withdrawal What is this vile poison, That gives and takes, What is this loud commotion, that makes the dead wake, the choirs of screams, that echo in my mind, the nightmares, the messengers, that plague the soul, that makes the creatures whole, this lie I live, why does it stay, only to haunt another age, days, seconds, and minutes go by, only to torture me, yet another time, demons knocking at my hearts door, consuming my mind, devouring my soul, attracting my flesh, only to let it go, the demons will reign, the needles, the pain, the creature it lurks, seeking only to torment, my human soul they crave -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I saw Tristian today, and i also met Ryan. Little did I know, he knew more about me than i knew about him. I was uncomfortable in an atmosphere of hatred and unwant, not only that but i was let down she did not wish to see me, i knew she wouldnt, i just sat there in that house, listening to them talking , i sat in the doorstep, always ready to go, but i thought that maybe if i stayed i could see what good Tristian saw in Ryan and his friends. and I saw what she saw, I saw nothing, the Tristian i knew was just a shattered memory, no longer acceptable, The Tristian i once knew was no longer replaced by this new Tristian. or rather did my entry into the picture change Tristian, and has she now just reverted back to her original self. one day i might know, but now i dont care, i thought that maybe i could be happy for her on account of her newfound happiness, but it was to no avail, her happiness, was at a cost. She has changed, and to be honest people to change, maybe i am the one that changed, maybe im just jealous. Maybe its selfish of me to say that she was better off with me than Ryan. He's opposed to all types of faith, and hates Christians. Whatever Tristian told him was a great deal, because as i said he knew more about me than he should have.

Anna, please call me

I usually dont do this. Anna, I need to talk to you, Call me around noon or later. Anna there is a lot of stuff I need to cover, all I ask is that you listen. by the way i got your song, Can't Go On. All of you reading, i want you to know that song is so deep, but if you want a different version try, "Clumsy," "Wit>You," 'Turn Back Time,' 'A thousand miles," "My life story," "My sacrifice"

I have found my place, my niche, my position, waiting, for me, to see it, standing there, all along, together, we had cried, we had laughed, I have come back, Accept me please, its all I ask, I would give anything for you, I love you
In staying, I leave no mark, no crater, emptiness, leaving, obliged, useless, this pain, suffering, torment, all in vain, no purpose remains
posed with a question, I ponder, I want to go, though escaping its grasp, my being, my concious, no longer of need, why should I remain
Well sitting here, i gaze into your eye, wondering, waiting, i urge, to break these reins, that have bound my soul, I love you
Day 2: The awakening I ran into Anna's uncle at school today, that was cool. Sadly however this is the second day I have not heard from her, I hope she is doing well.

right now I am researchign Trinidadian and Carib mythology searching for inspiration for my comp game, soon I will check Norse mythology and the Apocrypha, though I steer away from greek mythology, its overused almost a cliche.

Cold, so cold, Lacking emotion, missing compassion, no discretion, I long, time goes on, I cannot Love That would be the thought for the day, I realized I lack compassion and cannot feel emotions of others, and feel no sadness for them when they are sad, the reason for which I do not yet know, my sister feels compassion though, which means my family does not lack it, but she has a good relationship with one of my parents, while me on the other hand lack that. I feel it is because I have neglected them, not them I. I also noticed I lack discretion and common sense, or at least that's what my mother seems to point out, indiscreetly. Dont get me wrong, I love my parents, just it gets so hard sometimes to express my feelings. College work calls, night all of you, God Bless

Crying, I long for you, the hurt, like a blade, destined for my heart, sparing me in vein, let me taste the poison, let me embrace death, your sight has forsaken me, and your will, left me, forget me, I cannot lose you, I cannot find you, these feelings I have bind you, to a lost cause, I have lost, I have failed, But I hope you can taste the embrace, as descends upon your grace

I bear your wounds, I house your pain, Those words have echoed in my head for two days or somethign like that, well I started College today, it was definately a humbling experience that I enjoyed, I am happy to finally find myself amongst others much like me but not, in their own special ways. I do not understand this thing I am feeling, whenever I get in a church strange stuff begins to happen to me, and suddenly Anna knows more about spiritual stuff than me, something is occuring and I am not liking the potential outcome, talk to Anna if you want to know the specifics. I bear your wounds, I house your pain, borne of maimed, words, I smell your fear, I taste your blood, fearing, wasting, waiting, longing, you are near, your voice it soothes, your flesh it calls, your voice so sweet, standing here I ponder, considering my standing, wanting to see you, wanting to hold you, knowing, I back off, wisdom beckons, I come back, like a siren's touch your beauty, like scylla, I fear, Charybdis calls, I will miss you, I will miss you

This anger yearns, as my mind burns, to know, to shatter, to free itself of his embrace, this prince who comes, to get me repeatedly, I loathe his face, his touch, it binds, those in his stables, rendering thought unable, To bring him to his knees I vowed, 3 I have lost, only failure I have found, within my grasp I could have helped, though ambitions held me down, you brought me joy, through pain, 's endless games, torments will, your joy, your smile, made it worth the while, and I will endure

I found your secrets, uncovered your lies, staring into your eyes, I ask myself why, Why i trusted you, why i loved you, why i respected, why i gave my all to you, you violated me, took my life, shattered my mind, freed my soul, you gave me freedom, at a cost, all the life I lost, was it worth it, to risk it, to gamble, to fall, i left, you fled, arms open wide, you were accepted, to its grasp of terror, there you lay, there you hide, there you cry, there you will lay, there you will hide, there you will cry, sitting here I wait, for it to come for you, to talk with you, to watch it, to feel it, to laugh as it takes you, into its arm, to let you feel its icy embrace, to feel its cold face, to look it into ur cold eyes, and set you free.

You know Im here for you, I have told time and time again, but somehow its not enough, I need to open up, to let you know, How I feel, Too closed, too far, so distant, Im missing it, lacking that which I need, which is to understand, myself, so that I can get you, my pain, my torment, rocking my mind like torrents, of wind, of thunder but not blunders, from that land down under, So i have chosen to open up, and see, what the world is like with me, a happier place, to see you smile, to think I should stay awhile, to make it worth your while, Maybe I matter, perhaps I do, to someone such as you, so I will stay, I will continue, Thank you God, and Thank you

Schrodinger's Riddle : ill explain the riddle, in a box, there was nothing but a cat, and into the box a gas was released but you wouldnt know till you opened the box: -whether the cat was dead or alive -whether it died before or after the gas -whether it was dead to being with -or whether it died when the box was opened and experienced a pressure change or the addition of oxygen to the gas Pandora's Box : Well the only thing I know about Pandora's Box is that anything is that a total of everything and nothing combined or a total of everything, or a total of nothing, or total of something in between could happen, and to add to this dilemma of confusion that has already built up, everything or nothing is a random occurence, object, event, color, shape, space, time, thus a white hole and a black hole at the same time, but not a wormhole, NOT A WORMHOLE whatsoever You are probably sitting there wondering as to why I would even bother telling you about to Equally confusing situations, well this is why, I would like you to decide, then contact me with which one you think is more confusing, I will post it here on the site the totals.

Well today I hooked up my new monitor, *drools*, a nice flat panel LCD, I love it with a passion, but sadly its slow i mean it has a like a shadow thingy, but i guess it keeps me down to earth in some abstract way. Day by day the wound heals, the wound she inflicted stuck deep, She will never read this, for she does not know this is here, though someone else will feel her pain as a mistake, which has happened before, why must others suffer for others' transgressions. This cruel world, its master is even more so corrupt, this world, society i mean, is going to hell in a hand basket. The pain you bore was not my fault, it was you who caused it on me, you now bear my pain and your transgressions upon yourself. Which brings me to the subject of love, love is neverending, true love that is, pain is an affliction of the mind, if we didnt have a mind we wouldnt feel pain, and this is true, you are reading this wondering what I am getting at, those words are immortal, those three words, and this is why I do not say them often, so those of you who read this and love, know that it is only love if it is neverending, trust me on this, when you look back at your lives you will see.
That Song below is "Cruel Angel Thesis", on a side note it has echoed throughout the halls of my mind for days upon end, it sums up my life recently, I guess

Well I dont usually post lyrics to songs that I haven't written or influenced, but here is a song that I feel reflects something somewhere in someone who is reading this' life: Like a cruel angel, young boy, become the legend! A blue wind is now knocking at the door to your heart, and yet you are merely gazing at me and smiling. Something gently touching-- you're so intent on seeking it out, that you can't even see your fate yet, with such innocent eyes. But someday I think you'll find out that what's on your back are wings that are for heading for the far-off future. The cruel angel's thesis will soon take flight through the window, with surging, hot pathos, if you betray your memories. Embracing this sky [universe] and shining, young boy, become the legend! Sleeping for a long time in the cradle of my love The morning is coming when you alone will be called by a messenger of dreams. Moonlight reflects off the nape of your slender neck. Stopping time all throughout the world I want to confine them, but... So if two people being brought together by fate has any meaning, I think that it is a "bible" for learning freedom. The cruel angel's thesis. The sorrow then begins. You held tight to the form of life when you woke up from that dream. You shine brighter than anyone else. Young boy, become the legend! People create history while weaving love. Even knowing I'll never be a goddess or anything like that, I live on. The cruel angel's thesis will soon take flight through the window, with surging, hot pathos, if you betray your memories. Embracing this sky and shining, young boy, become the legend!

Freed from my curse, My soul is shattered, my wings tasting air, but that is not the case, happy yet sad, the moon is bittersweet, red as blood, blue as peace, death waited, it called, I came, answered its discernment, Sitting there, it burned, though I yearned, for it all to end, looking, you do not know what to think, I know you read this, it watches silently, unable, to watch, I sit, defeated, broken, and freed, my captor slain, I cry, tears of pain, tears of resentment, tears of joy, I gave to it my life, my all, my love, it never was returned, so all I do is sit, wait, and wonder, Was it all worth the while?

Well today it clicked in my mind that none of you really know who Anna is so yeah, Ill do you all the favor of explaining Anna to you all. Hmmn, Anna in a nutshell. Well if Anna were a nut she would be a cashew. Yeah I know its very descriptive eh? Hmmn how about an acorn, no an ONION!!!!!!!!!! Yes an onion, hmmn, yes she has layers and much like the city of midgar (yeah, all you folks who played final fantasy 7, you ROCK, yeah rock on, and all of you who have not, then yeah go PLAY IT), it has many sectors that have yet to be destroyed, and opened so that all can see the true interior of this, *beautiful* city. ok, so maybe my description of Anna, was not really the best, but she really is a great girl. So kind, though like coffee she has perks, but like coffee, keeps you awake until midnight, and doesnt let you down, until you cant get anymore. so maybe I am making Anna overated, but honestly she is a great person, and a great friend, and I am sure that anyone who truly gets to know her, would really like her as much as I do. And yeah like Allie and Becca, if you have a problem with Anna, you are going to have to deal with me, and that is not the wisest thing to do, mostly because you will need to find me first which is not very easy, and second, yeah, ill break every bone in your body, then eat them for dinner, mmmmmnnnn marrow. lol, on a side note , i thought you might want to know that in Trinidad people eat the bones of the meat they consume, so it runs in the genetics, I am Trinidadian, and on a side note, some cannabalism runs in my blood, so yeah watchout. Anyways anyone reading this is probably beginning to think I am some sort of dangerous person, lol, honestly I couldnt hurt a fly.

!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!Update!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! The New chapter has begun Dark Chapters (Chronological to some extent oldest to newest): A Twisted Path - My obsession with Ren and Stimpy, and Tales from the crypt, that warped my views of reality Their Twisted Ideals - Point in my childhood when i was repeatedly harrassed at school, tormenting and beating me. I eventually snapped Shifting Paths - Time when when my Grandfather became ill, we moved alot, he died, and we relocated to Washington The Shadows' Calling - A period of time in which Nightmares plagued my dreams, part of this period intertwined with the Forbidden Love chapter. Meeting Jamie, unlocked my ability to understand the irony of my relationship between my life and my dreams. A New Friend - Time in which I met Kelly, we got close as friends. Later due to my errors we grew apart, she moved at the tailend of Forbidden Love, since then we have gotten closer Forbidden Love - Tristian, Anna, and Ryan Inc....and burning anger toward my parents. Tristian unlocked my ability of poetry, perhaps the only good part of this chapter. Dearest *Lost through out the test of time*, I am borne of myself - Key Players in my life this chapter will probably be, Nik, Lexy ((Rebirth, revised) = (She's back)), Allie, Anna, David, Nathan, and Arthur/James. This chapter will probably cover my life through college, my awakening to the fact that I am not as volatile as I thought I needed to be, and probably the trip to Canada.

!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!UPDATE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! My Cast has been Changed SIGNIFICANTLY!!!!!!! Tristian - My First girlfriend, and ultimately my last, 2.5 months. She had the biggest effect of them all, she taught me friendship, and unlocked my poetry skills. Ryan - The name of the guy that ends up going out with the girl I just broke up with....believe me, every girl I have ever had was taken by "a" ryan Ryan D. - Personally I dont know him, but apparently he IS a nice guy, if he wasn't and I were to find out,DAMN there would be HOT blood on the walls!!!!! Lexy - My second girlfriend, five minutes, On a side note, that was the best five minutes (other than like worship last week) of my life, she's funny, humourous, enjoyable(somehow all three relate), Hmmnn compassionate, chances are if i went on I would probably talk myself into going out with her again, i really dont want to screw up again with her, took to long for me to finally realize that I was a self-righteous bastard of a jerk, but yeah anyways, HEY LEXY!!!!!!!!!. She found the Our Lady Peace CD I hooked her up with. As far as the whole girlfriend thing, it was my fault we broke up anyways, im so freakin immature at times. on a side note, Lexy is awsome, she has been there for me, and I have been a jerk to her, and she has still been there for me, so Lexy, if you are reading this, Im sorry, k? Email me when you read this. Anna - My most recent girlfriend (3rd), 2 weeks (yeah im getting up pretty high now), Actually to be honest I have gotten past that whole "lust" thing (YOU KNOW WHAT I MEaN!!!!!!!), I mean i can think about her and like not "think" about her at the same time. Well lately she has become part of the family, I mean shes here so friggin much, its cool though, cuz like yeah, shes cool. Sometimes I wonder about why, yeah thats a whole new subject, but yeah if any one Reading this has a bone to pick with Anna, then take it to me. Kelly - My first friend that i met when i moved here, we have been through tough and good times, she moved away this summer, i knew her 3 yrs...we still keep in contact Allie H. - At first a friend of my sister, but I got to know her. I have been there for her, and her for me, one of my closer friends that I respect. Yeah, i have guided her through the art of releasing angry energy through Poetry, She has come so far. Becca - A friend that helped end the Reprise of the "Twisted Path" and "The Shadows' calling" chapters, she helped calm my anger and sadness Jimmy - One of my closest, and best friends, he introduced me to warhammer, and the vast collection of Stephen King. Tim - For about 3 months during "Forbidden Love" i valued his advice, he had to offer Jeff - Another of my close friends, he has always been there for me, he's also an accomplished musician Shauna - A new friend, and possibly a key player in the next chapter of my life. She has a heart for God, and has had some good advice Makenzie - Also a new friend, Brad's girlfriend. She's into some horror movies, so she's my unnoficial movie critic Brad - Key factor in the next chapter. Even though he's 2 months older, I took him under my wing and consider him my younger brother. The Manuscripts on Rose have been Found...Apparently after her birth she was exiled this is the tale: "There was once a very beautiful maiden who lived on the shores of the river Styx. Rose was her name and she lived by the banks all by her self. It was a gloomy river, fed by a waterfall of equal gloom. It’s waters where said to be poisonous, plunging down a steep gorge to the underworld where Hades ruled over the dead souls. The Gods of Olympus swore on the river for it held an unbreakable oath that bound them. Rose had lived by the river Styx for as long as she could remember. Its waters captivated her and illuminated her ever-growing beauty. Over the years the river slowly began to possess her and encircled her inner soul. The poison from the stream seduced her and she became one with the river. Longing to over take others. She was deadly. By her icy cold stream she sat and waited… surrounded by the lethal gasses escaping from the potent waters. Her heart is now black and cold, frozen is the blood that once ran through her veins. Encircled by a black velvet cape poised in beauty and grace, but deadly in kiss she sat by the water and waited. Always longing to be set free but still captivated by the venomously powerful surges that run through her fragile body. The poisonous water continually overtook this elegantly beautiful creature and with her last grip on life she lifted her eyes toward to Mt. Olympus and to Zeus. After looking upon the tormented face of the fair maiden Zeus took pity on her and ordered the release of the river’s hold on her. Her body fell into its deeply potent waters. She mournfully chanted, singing to herself of the rivers defeat until the falling of night. Floating gently down it’s waters, now lying robed in snowy white as she sailed underneath the purple night she died. But in her place, now pure white roses float remembering the maiden who died in peace singing forever the songs of her release." From the Writings of Bethany Blair, Philosopher

A day in the Life of Sony. "Good Morning. Wait to whom Do I say good morning to, in fact, where am I? This is strange Indeed, for no longer can I see the walls of Val Halla." Sony wondered. She did not notice Sean walking up to her "You over there!...Yeah You...Who are you?" Sean Spoke.

we got us some Geneology updates on the 4 girls now. Rose - She is the Daughter of Aprodite and Loki....yes loki Marvel - well she was born of a corporation, yeah you know like the "Do the Evolution" music video, like that huge machine giving birth...but yeah she's still a mystery Victoria - She is the daughter of Odin and the Soucouyant, Beautiful and Deadly. Sony - we only know her as Thor's Kid, but one day we meet her mother

Rose, as said earlier is of the Styx. Why she was down there, we were not entirely sure but I am under the Impression that Thor and Loki and something to do with it. You all are probably confused at to where they are from: Rose- Hails from the Styx, Daughter of the Greeks, for some odd reason the Norse seem to know her. Marvel - Tim's House, where else??? She follows the ways of Activision, the company that she is derived from. Victoria - Well, not entirely sure but she hails from the mall, most likely Caribs. Sony - Hailing from the world of Technology, an Advocate of Technocracy, and also a daughter of the Norse. We have decided to consult several leading authorities on Paranormal activity to find out why these four have revealed themselves. "Zey are ze Riderz of ze apocalypze" --Sigmund Froid "Hmmn, stay away from them..." --Mark Clements "Hmmn, why again are you bothering me" --Seth Mullinex "I am of the Styx" -- Sean Impersonating Rose Well as in normal Applications, Leading authoritiess do not know what they are talking about. It seems as though Tim has taken to Rose.....though as with me...I have taken to Victoria...Marvel and Sony have remained unaligned

Well Since the Mysterious Arrival of the 4 girls, alot of strange stuff has been happening. Rumour has that Rose is of the Styx, then again Tim never does tell us where he found her, then again I remember meeting her back in the day, but then again some people say that School is hades, so I guess its close. As For Marvel, Tim has lived with her for years, but he never known her, until Bloody Roar was released, then he knew she was marvel. I have known Sony for a while, though her roots are strange. As far as Victoria goes, found her in a Mall. Hmmn what is their purpose is this dimension? Rose as come as a harbringer to us, to show us something....though we are not sure what. Marvel, well she was always here, though her purpose is not clear. Victoria seeks to enlighten us I believe, and Sony has come to open my eyes. On this site I will be recording, their adventures as well as mine, from now on.

Hmmn, good Idea, I think I am going to start a small Cel-shaded anime, about....well thats the problem...I have characters though. I am considering going off of my story pitch with the 2 girls, the Riven and the Oni. that would be sweet. But hmmn I have a plot. The year is 2013 and the Vatican has once again risen into power, they have established a secret movement. Each person has an embryo within them, that is growing constantly, feeding off of emotions and thoughts. Within the Embryo there will be a creature that is growing, aging, maturing. Each bloodline has an embryo that is passed on to its children, though the children's embryo will differ as much as their DNA does. That creature will become the person's new body should they die of nuclear or parapsychological interference. Depending on the way they die, it will affect the creature that is born. Should the reaction be parapsychological, then the creature would begin to encase itself, in a metallic flesh. Though should it be nuclear the Creature would begin to mutate, more so than before. It will be about Two girls, Sariel and Shamsiel (Mictecacihuatl), raised in separate monastaries. One in a carib encampment, and the other in a Mayan settlement. As far as the histories of the the monastaries go, one was an underground temple and the other a ziggurat. The two girls had been taken from their parents, and thus they have no "family." during the inquisition (1500 ad), the inquisitors had brought far more simply blades of steel, they had harnessed and brought the power of the atom. While there, they had fully used its power, wiping out the indigenous people; looking like simply sickness to those on the outside, and what the historical texts had recorded it as. Within the Ziggurat, Sariel had been at the altar, sleeping, when the blast enveloped her, it had completely devoured her whole, her embryo though, had protected her mind, her conciousness. The embryo though had not been ready to hatch, so it lay dormant in its cocoon of energy, for many years. Inside the Carib temple (1999), Shamsiel had been attending the monastery, being trained in the arts, an accomplished student. Though the training those girls had received, would have never prepared them for the onslaught of what happened next, a deviation of the Knights Templar had come to purge the settlement, believing them to be heretics. The Templar left none of the buildings in the settlement standing. Though they felt they had not completly destroyed the encampment, they placed devices that would amplify the psychic emanations of those present. In doing so, the amount of psionic energy produced had vaporize the Templar order, and those within the temple. Shamsiel's embryo survived, though so did her human body, she was not about to let go of her humanity. Protagonists : Sariel Shamsiel Antagonists : The Vatican The Anarcho-Sanctum Movement The Fallen

I really missed the time that we had spent together in the past, but last night made up for the time I hadn't seen her. I really want to see her more often, but she has a tight schedule, and mine is empty, maybe I should let her have some of mine. yeah, it was like a dream I never wanted to leave. Lexine, I miss you, and want to see you again.

each episode will A) focus on a seperate character's life in the Hive B) Show their perspective on the ongoing Hive problems, and how they choose to align with Wrath or mercy. I think that Idea would be better than going ahead and putting bios at the end of each episode.

Idea...Bling Bling. Everytime we introduce a new character to the series, we add a bit about them at the end of the episode...so the first few episodes will be short, seeing as all the main characters are being introduced.

I think we will aim for 15 minute episodes, with 30 second opening, and a 1 minute ending, so roughly 13.5 minutes per episode...lol unless we can get some script writers, I really need scriptwriters. Oh, and those of you who read this site, try to spread the word about Project Urban Chaos...we really need actors and scripts. Though 20 minutes, with a minute opening, and a minute and a half closing would be nice.

Cover "small creatures clad in metal running, me, security guard, and child" -sent to "LA" -getting off plane I am confronted by a black security guard, who believes I have something different - Gain 'location'. Some sort of strange open area with pipes and ladders, and steam everywhere. - achieve alien/demon form and kill off a large building of people. - I look around LA, and begin to follow a small race of creatures - they water the ground, so that footsteps are not heard, and they sneak me into a building, which turns out to become my new head quarters - sneak into a building achieve alien/demon form, and begin to slaughter people one by one. In this form, I can climb walls, and leap great distances - and by mistake, I have compassion and leave the top floor alive (in elevator) - I leave building - child makes comment that he saw the large creature sneak off, and leave in a 5th wheel - child wanders off, and starts climbing around over ground exhaust pipes. Wondering who I am. After asking the question out loud, a tablet appears on one of the pipes with writing saying “maybe you are him” he asks again what it is and “you the one related to the sister” and “what great power will be given” overall is trying to get him to reveal my secret that they think he knows, by coercing him with the writing. (using some writing on tablets with chalk, some with blood, some with black ink). In French, English and Spanish writing. - I take child to security guard and tell guard that the child is toying with forces that he does not understand. - Some how the small creatures contact me, and tell me that there is a greater force arriving soon. Something about converting “floaters” into living metal, so that they may be transferred is mentioned. Assumed that is coming to exterminate me and me alone. - All my friends are in the new head quarters at some party. It is in some sort of building on a high floor, as there are big windows. There is a big screen TV and also a projector aimed against a wall that is adjacent to the stair case, the projector has a built in NES system. - My friends leave. I follow “Nathan” through parking lots in my alien/demon form, taking care not to give into bloodlust and kill him. I find my dad, and revert to my human form and follow him to our car. The car is a covered car, although it feels as though it has no top. We drive down the road and see many motor cycles, both racing, Harleys and street cycles. I recognize a few of the bikers, who are fighting amongst themselves; I have pain within, and try to convince my father not to stop at the next stop. We stop; it is like a car dealer. I get out of my car, and walk around, I see “Nathan” but he doesn’t see me. Apparently the motorcycles are going to begin a race, 2 head off parallel to each other so that they can prepare to start going. For no apparent reason, loud music appears and a rave begins within the crowd, my father returns, I try to keep him away from the crowd seeing as I know some of the people in the crowd. My father disappears, because of this. The rave and the dancing continue. Fights break out within the crowd, but for the most part they continue to have their rave. - Some of the bikes go racing off, I follow, and come across Shawn, David, and a couple other people. They are all on bikes, trying to cross the road, we wait, until there is a fast car in one direction, and a large truck in the other. I run, they ride over, I don’t think I can make, I close my eyes last minute, not sure if I have finished crossing, they think I will get hit, the cars disappear and I am fine. We begin to head home.

I spent the whole day today, considering the existence of a disease that spread over the internet. it would have to be somesort of frequency discharge, that triggered a virus or bacteria to awaken. It clouded my mind all day, maybe that dream had some sort of societal implication.

Last night was pretty messed up. My dream at least. I was in my house, checking my email, the servers were all going slowly. Overall it had a very cyberpunk "lost" feel to it. Each email I opened, there was a video sequence of people making out slowly, and I hit the "x" button, but it was going slowly, I didnt want my mother to see the email. I was warned by mother something of something called Armageddon, a disease that was sent via the internet and computers. I went back to my computer and continued to look through my email, all I can remember is that one of the emails was from LEXINE GUNDERSON, that was the exact typecase, I opened it, and it showed once again people making out. I tried to close the email but it wouldnt close for along time, and once again it was a pretty close call. I never did find out what Armageddon was.

Of Centaurs, Cockatrices and Dragons This gets so much stranger. I obviously don't read my bible enough, if I read these verses correctly: Isaiah 11:8 Isaiah 14:29 Isaiah 59:5 In a way it shows that the bible claims that Cockatrice's really do / did exist. This is very interesting, I am not sure what to say, I thought they were simply myths, but I suppose they do/did exist. Numbers 21:6 Whatever was at that point in Number's sounded much like a Dragon of sorts, or somethign like that. Actuall Isaiah 14:29 seems to hint at Cockatrice's fathering Dragons...this is getting insane. Hmmn another reference to the Fiery [flying] serpent. Isaiah 30:6 As does Psalm 91:13 Isaiah 27:1 Isaiah 51:9 Even stranger, I look at Jeremiah 51:34 , and I am beginning to lose it at this point. This says "he hath swallowed me up like a dragon ." How can the Bible keep on referencing these Dragons, they must exist/ existed at some time. Well, I dont know if I should even mention Revelations as far as beasts go, that gets even stranger. Revelation 12:3 , actually mentions what I believe to be a hydra, that means so far, the Bible has affirmed the existence of Cockatrice's, Dragons and Hydras, which is oh so strange. In Revelation 12:7 , Michael is said to have had war with the Dragon, which again is said to be called a Dragon, saying once again that Dragon's existed. Don't worry though.. It get's stranger, Revelation 9:7-10 Speaks of Locusts that " 7 And the shapes of the locusts were like unto horses prepared unto battle; and on their heads were as it were crowns like gold, and their faces were as the faces of men. 8 And they had hair as the hair of women, and their teeth were as the teeth of lions. 9 And they had breastplates, as it were breastplates of iron; and the sound of their wings was as the sound of chariots of many horses running to battle. 10 And they had tails like unto scorpions, and there were stings in their tails: and their power was to hurt men five months." Yeah sounds incredibly like The Sphinx to me, or some sort of Centaur thing. Very odd if you ask me, very odd. Oh and get this, they have a king, known as Abaddon to the Jews, and Apollyon to the Greek. The Bible said that he was Apollyon to the Greek, which acknowledges the fact that the Greek existed. So I wase more or less right in saying there were indeed Dragons, Cockatrices, and Leviathans, and to a lesser degree the Greek were right in saying Centaurs existed. I would have to say that I do believe the Greek based their mythology on what really was happening. Nonetheless, I find it very odd that the Bible mentioned Cockatrice's I had heard that name once more, and that was it. The Bible doesn't say much about them, but it does mention that they have Dens, and are at the Root of Dragons. The Bible mentions that the fruit of the Cockatrice is indeed a fiery flying serpent, which for the sake of simplicity I would say is a Dragon indeed. Completely away from the Bible I read about the Cockatrice this morning, as being the "king" of serpents, which the Bible reinforces, if it is True that Dragons are the fruit of Cockatrices, then yes they would have to be "kings" of serpents. You all know of Centaurs and Dragons, but not many of you know of Cockatrices, I will now explain for all of you that are remotely lost. Cockatrices, are born of the eggs of birds, and are some how part snake, part bird, AND they have a devasting gaze, and breath. So very odd. Really any feedback would be nice, if possible

So hmmn, Did I tell you all about the concert on the 19th? well yeah it rocked. It started with Agony Scene, they are really good, but have really short songs, and Probably should have been on longer. They claim to have americanized European metal, but I am not sure if that is the case. All that I can say for sure is that their Vocalist, has a really high pitch when he screams, like Roz from Still Breathing. During their stage presence I bought the Beloved CD, and the Norma Jean CD. It was funny however, because I got Habeas Corpus mixed up with Shotgun Wedding, so like, I was wondering why the Lyrics sounded so messed up. Then Beloved came on, that calmed the crowd down a little, and it was great, I loved it. At the end the guitarist hung his guitar by the 1/4 cable, and it hit the stage, it was great, Dave was sitting there all like "no, that guy is stupid." Figure four then came up, and I bought the Agony Scene CD. We were upfront for Figure Four, and yeah....let's jsut say we were caught in a 45 minute Mosh Pit, well I was at least...David Left me there, and so did Kalee. At the end however, we missed Norma Jean because David had to get home before Midnight..so I was ...saddened.

What I will do, I have no idea, ...I Could be doing other things, instead I record my life, knowing that someone is reading, we both know who I am talking about, so all I can say is 'please', and that is it. Like a Shining Rogue, I have to rescue her, I know not when though. I look to stories, and other contrived things, everything happens so simply , while life is so....Chaotic

"In a world of dying children, rain never seems to cease" --Brave Saint Saturn 'Two-Twenty-Nine' Like in that story, "the Book of Sand", I record my life into this webpage, hoping that somewhere I am affecting someone's judgement on something, ....maybe I am, and maybe I am not, She told me I will do great things, they all did, I will not let them down, I will do great things.

Why is it the soft stuff, that gets us going? I mean even if we listen to death metal and what not, a slow song can be just what we need sometime, not even slow, just something that is acoustic, you know it changes everything completely. Just like a rising Pheonix. Lately that bird kinda reminds me of myself, as I pull my self together and straighten up. I need to get ready for College, you know moving away and all. Closing loose ends, and getting used to Change. Maybe Miranda is reading this, maybe she is still sick of me....maybe she isnt...just contact me somehow, please.

How will I save her, if I cant keep my own life in order, know what I am saying? I suppose that if the Pheonix can rise out of the ashen wastes, as will I save her from herself, and her surroundings, I swore I would.
The promises I make, are not hollow, regardless of what they may think. Contrary to what they think, I am not shallow.

"One day ... I will save you" --Me Yeah, One day I told her that, infact I promised her that. Sometimes I wonder what possesed me to say it, I believe it was simply my own conviction that made me do it, my own violition. Nonetheless, I think I still will somehow. Another called me tonight, I sat there thinking "why" I had blown her off to hang out with my dad, I regret blowing her off, nonetheless, my Dad and I dont hang out a lot so it was a hard call. When forced between friends and family, love and life, blood is thicker than water. Life or Love, Life or Damnation, I choose life over it. I just realized that, well I have one more to call mom, so odd, if you were to ask me, nonetheless I will still take that as an offering of respect. My tears burn with unknown fear, and lost hate. Have you ever hated, and yet not sure what you hate, or why you hate what you dont know. I wonder how many people actually read this webpage, Email me ASAP, if you read this.

Yeah anyways, was thinking about my dream last night. I called on a pay phone, and they came, I saw a blinding trail of light trailed after by smoke. Shawn showed up in ...a mustang (04 model I think), but yeah and he was like "what are you doing" and I said something like "they are coming" and he turned around and could see the meteor like object go plummeting into the distance, there was a small explosion, and yeah. I was trying to find someone who could get me to Bauer hall, but that wasnt working lots of people were running around, but no one was there, so I kept on pleading that, if I was the only person left running around outside, that they would find and get me. A large object was then seen pacing the sky, and strafing, looking for I guess me. No one would help me or believe me, they were all interested in a film about a giant violent rabit eating lasagna, or something like that. I continued running, I ended up at home after not being able to find Bauer Hall, I got inside, and noone was there, it was black inside, and all I could see why twilight pouring in from the windows, I hid in the bathroom, under a towel, and through the window I could see a red light zoning in on me.

fist in the heavens, feet on the clouds, swaying thoughts, pulsating, falling down, the sky shatters, emblazed by burning stars, my eyes blinded, this pain, overwhelming, I fall, no longer able to complete, I concede

From my mouth spews, these lewd thoughts, my eyes only watching what I do, hearing the crackling of thunder, I move to the rhythm of the cracking bones, the crawling on my faces, the skin curling, pricking, pricking, needles pulled out, hell in bottle, hell in a can, I drink away my pain, showering them in my veins, twisted and jaded, I pull, wrapping them in the scarlet hues, crucified in their vile poses, they are defamed, and desecrated they fall

I swing my staff, reigning with fire, I dance upon the ashes, made in my wake, kiss the mountain tops, and let the earth rain down fury, I am not yet done, I am far from complete, what have I come to, simply rescue my and set me free, simply rescue me and set me free, feel my wrath, let my venom marinate in your precense, I have no more

Some people out there, truly aggrivate me though. Those who "make someone weak at the knees", then explain make that person feel low, then have them run to them for comfort, so that they can change them into what they need, and move on. Hypocrisy, don't you love the bittersweet taste of it. Manipulation, used daily by even the most righteous of us. and we subject ourselves to this because?
Those that have, wish they didn't, those that don't, wish that they did, hypocrisy, spurs us, drives us, beckons us, under its wings, I feel at home, my soul sacrificed, under my own withdrawal.
I am sick of bloody people, trying to manipulate others into exploiting their weaknesses, so that they can take advantage of that to get their way with them, whatever it may be.

Janelle brought up the point about my sister last night, and well she had a really good point about it, I ..along with my parents will have a lasting impression on my sister. I guess she looks up to me, and I never really have thought much about it. to see him, come home from school, do homework, be on the computer, talk on the phone a whole lot, and never really see him see the light of day, or hang out with him. he excludes me from what he does, and I try to talk to him but he is always busy. He never helps me with homework, but helps others. Never can spare the time to talk to me. All we ever do together is play video games. he keeps me out of the loop with his friends, and never tries to include me, he does what he thinks is right, but in the process only continues to exclude me That would really bother me if that were the person I was looking up to. In fact now I feel like a jerk, then again I guess I sort of am. Just seeing Lexine again, reminded me of my arrogance, and talking to her is always humbling, probably always will be. then again, who would want to look up to someone, like stated above. I don't want my sister to end up like me, I guess that's the price I have to pay for my own ambition. In a way, I suppose that Ariel is simply an only child, seeing I will be moving out in less than a year anyways. Here is anthem, I identify this song as an anthem. We have to press on. We all harbor our own issues, issues of abandonment, lack of commitment, lack of self-worth, jadedness, loss of friends, exile, alienation, cruel nature, whichever it may be. I suppose it's what makes many of have something in common. Artist: Demon Hunter Album: Demon Hunter Song: My Throat Is An Open Grave We lay face in pale solitude. To save face, we pulled our walls in front of you. To the same place where we danced in front of you. We fell from grace and watched the hope'fall from your face. This isn't me i used to say. All the love was so gone. It feels good to be alive. I've been dead for so long: and all the broken promises. I can't face. Afraidif someone notices, I lose my place. Fractured, broken, paralyzed. I need some space, tear me open, analyze. This isn't me i used to say. All the love was so gone. It feels good to be alive. I've been dead for so long. Wake up screaming, I'm awake and dreaming, And i won't stop breathing until my heart stops beating. This isn't me, i used to say. All the love was so gone, It feels good to be alive, I've been dead for so long.

Anyways, I mean i have never really been around people my own age, it gets lonely. I am not saying that lonely is bad, just really, I never really see anyone my own age, everyday is the same thing, wake up go to school, come home, and what not, I mean I guess when I start working it will be the same thing, wake up, go to work come home, aspire for something more. As humans I guess we always long for more than we can really achieve, or do we? Persistence pays off, if you work at anything hard enough you can achieve almost anything, so what if I set my sights high? Perhaps I can acheive them, so don't sit there and hate because of my ambitions. I open my eyes, and eve's touch blessing my eyes, I want to reach higher, I want to be able walk amongst legends, resisted and forsaken, my arms are scarred, with years of unrest, and self worth, blood spilled for unworthy purposes, redeeming myself for nothing, tears scarring my face, sunken limbs to show my battered will, not willing to go on, I pressed, hoping it would all end, a single drop of blood, guided me on my way, not sure of what may come, I follow

Strange dreams last night. I saw visions of Ships crashing into other ships, sinking them, but no one seemed to find out, so no one seemed to care. Deaths going unnoticed. In another section of the dream I saw, well I am not sure what, what seemed like a crimson velvet type thing, ensnaring and constricting someone in a crucifix type deal thing. The most memorable part was when I was walking through Airport security I think it was, I think the shirt I put through was made of some wood fiber, and the xray thing wasn't registering it, so I exclamed that "the machines couldn't read it". Within seconds I was taken down by security, and a group of people to what seemed to be an insane ward. They were asking me what I was planning to do while they were wheeling me around, when I was about to tell them what happened, they injected me with a sedative, and I passed out. I woke up with a think cabled into my arm, and looking around a hospital room, not sure what to think, I was telling them that I was innocent, but the more I did, the more morphine they put in, and the more tired I grew, they sent people in. To interrogate me, and I was trying to get out, but they were convinced that I was going to kill them all. Really odd dream, not sure if it was near as odd as my dream I once had with, the two people that walked into a hospital room where a man was lying on the bed, and his wife or girlfriend was sitting in a corner. the two people opened the man's chest, and stabbed his heart. If I remember correctly the woman killed the two people afterwards.

Forsaken Hearts Verse 1 : My love grown cold, Breaking the mould, (Broken, I lost the pieces), Broken, I lost the pieces, What will I do, Where will I go, I have lost my path, (I have forsaken my aid) Verse 2 : You were there for me, I forsaked you, (I forsaked you), You needed me, I turned my back, (I sit here crying myself to sleep), at night I wonder what ever happened to us, (You were there for me) Verse 3 : (Poem after Poem was written), to express the pain I felt, melting away at me I can't go on, I burned myself, (Buried), in my own transgressions, (Buried), I lost you (Buried), in my own pain. Intro : "not of this mind, nor of this day" Chorus : I will Rise, (Higher), Ascending, freeing myself, Imprisoned no more, I will find my way, Guided I can see, (Forgotten I am lost), Forgotten, I can see. (Forgotten I Forsake you) Lost, I will find you Outro : (I sat there, and wrote this, hoping you would hear this, Maybe I was wrong, maybe I was all along, but all I want you to know is that, I'm back, Receive me) Basic Structure of Song : Intro -> Verse 1 -> Chorus -> Verse 2 -> Chorus -> Verse 3 -> Chorus -> Verse 4 -> Chorus -> Outro

Carrots and Question Marks Verse 1 : Spinning in this blizzard, Orange haze invading my mind, My eyes are burning, (Plagued) by these questions Verse 2 : When I was young I wanted to fly, to leave this all behind, This Orange introduction, pleading with me for it's life, Verse 3 : (Strike the sky, let it roam free, split it down the middle, thunder spark the sea, Lightning fry the ground, Never to hit me.) Verse 4 : Orange, strike the trees, turn them autumn, strike my eyes, turn it brown, (boil my flesh), (sear my skin), (bronze my face) Verse 5 : I used to Love, Now I don't, this orange plaguing me, (my eyes opened), Split in two, you used to be there, (frail), I used to be me, (exempt), I will roam, Discipline, Mocks me Verse 6 : I am still here, (defend me), you used to, (protect me), you still do, (what you can to reach out to me), my own visions, (in your sights), and places to visit Intro : Lost in this sea of confusion, bombarded by feelings, and emotions, I am lost. Bridge : Bridge the gaps, seal the pain, feel my hands, gripping in vain, (feed my hunger), (feed my pain), Arise Disdain Chorus : I am sick of living like this, I am sick of driving off emotion, this stake in my heart, I push it (deeper), (Deeper, into me, to sever) (Sever!) (Sever!) These limbs I don't need, Give me a crutch, put my bleeding self on a stilt, This Orange Haze Outro : "Who left this Carrot, On my couch...and where are my Bi-Focals" Structure of Song: Intro -> Bridge Verse 1 -> Bridge -> Chorus Verse 2 -> Bridge -> Chorus Verse 3 -> Chorus Verse 4 -> Bridge -> Chorus Verse 5 -> Bridge -> Chorus Verse 6 -> Chorus -> Bridge -> Bridge -> Chorus -> Outro

Artist: Mae Album: Destination: Beautiful Song: This Time Is The Last Time Save yourself. Because the only thing that matters is that you get away from the pain and the thought of losing your mind. Don't blame yourself. It was everyone around you who made you act this way. There's the stage and your chance to watch it go down. Don't fake yourself into ever, ever thinking about yesterday. That was then, this is now. Don't call it undone. Don't take what you've been dealt. You can exit out the back and make your getaway before anyone can see the damage you have done. This time is the last time so be here, here now. This time is the last time. Somehow make it through. State your case. You've got everyone's attention. What can you say? Thanks or forget what you've been given. Take your place. Do you think that you deserve the best of everything? We don't get why you're here. Can you figure it out? This time is the last time so be here, here now. You've got to get away. Oh, I get lost in the thought of losing you. You've got to get away. I know it's a dream but it must be true. Wave now goodbye. It's the lesson that you've been given. You can always move on to better things. This time is the last time so be here, but be here now. This time is the last time somehow. This time is the last time so be here, but be here now. This time is the last time. Somehow make it through. For Him to send someone to meet her there. Maybe if I took a little time to talk then she'd heal a little if she wants to. She can run but let's teach her how to walk away now. I'll shake a little if she wants to she'll laugh a little if she needs to. There's a key to the door that she's hiding behind. And no one knows the thoughts, the dreams, and the ideas she's got and contains inside. She's broken apart and her heart is still lookin for somewhere to feel alright.
