Artist : The Juliana Theory Title: Duane Joseph tell your mom you need a day off so we can play out in the rain we'll catch a ride to the mall, go down to the arcade cause that's where all the cool kids hang tell your mom you need a day off cause i don't feel like school today we'll ride our boards down the hill and to the playground where everything's ok tell your mom that you'll be home late cause building cabins in the woods is hard work you always know that i'll be here cause summer time is coming near my closest friend you'll always be you are a hometown kid like me tell your mom to make us lunch now cause we worked up an appetite g.i. joes and karate matches in the backyard where everything's all right now i can see that things have changed we've gone our separate ways now and it's not you and me anymore, it's not you and me why can't it be the way it was when pain was only plastic guns my closest friend i couldn't say you are a millionmiles away i guess i'll hold my breath there is no harm in hoping for change. That song is so sad, the live version at least. Kind of depressing, it evokes a sadness in me. Reminds me of friends lost, when I left Canada at the age of 11 or so, I left a lot behind, 6+ yrs of friendships just to vanish into thin air. After leaving I finally see who was and wasn't my friend. I mean to most people, I was there at school one day, then I never showed up the next day. It was really sad looking back at it, never seeing them again, only a fraction of a memory was left over. I keep in contact with a couple of them. I miss that place so much, but I suppose if I went back, that place wouldn't welcome me anymore than it should. But yeah, this song ...grr so much sadness. I don't see why, it's evoking sadness and yeah. Friendships lost, and friends becoming enemies, I just want to leave, I don't want that to happen again, my friendships are already deteriorating, but one remains strong, getting only stronger by the day. What can we depend on, why do we depend on this world to fulfill us, why do we depend on it to make us happy. shouldn't we have learned like the child placing it's hand on the stove, that it was hot and that it shouldn't touch it...right? Who knows... A friend made a point to me last night that "joy" is fabricated, and well not all joy is, but the majority of what you see in the world is fabricated. One moment, I will look up joy and happy in the dictionary: Main Entry: hap·py Pronunciation: 'ha-pE Function: adjective Inflected Form(s): hap·pi·er; -est Etymology: Middle English, from hap Date: 14th century 1 : favored by luck or fortune : FORTUNATE 2 : notably fitting, effective, or well adapted : FELICITOUS 3 a : enjoying or characterized by well-being and contentment : JOYOUS b : expressing or suggestive of happiness : PLEASANT c : GLAD, PLEASED d : having or marked by an atmosphere of good fellowship : FRIENDLY 4 a : characterized by a dazed irresponsible state b : impulsively or obsessively quick to use or do something c : enthusiastic about something to the point of obsession : OBSESSED synonym see LUCKY, FIT

Look at ancient Civilizations, they used chants and beating drums to spur on their anger, while as one person said "Music calms the savage beast," which is just as true, with music, one can change the emotions and thoughts of the masses. Ever wonder why listening to any country evokes the same effects, or the fact that Thrash Metal, and Emo Metal can actually calm oneself rather than enrage. Ever wonder about that? or How Classical can get people to change their mindsets, freeing themselves, why else do you think Extol, reverts to classical as much as it needs, same with Zao. Well that's me for now...see you all later. and Hey Katrina!

Actually, you're thinking of "El Snow White." It's a nice story about a woman who lives with 7 midgets, one of which is a pumpkin. They had to go up a hill to get their water, because they were afraid of the Ogre that lived under the bridge and ate trogladites. "El Pepito" is a small device Tyler stole from the Russian mob. He uses it to control the weather, do his homework, make French fries, and ship live elk via UPS. Oh yeah, it also converts video into DV streams for processing on his Mac. --Tyler

I never realized how cool Ellen was until today, I mean I never really thought too much of her. I had her number on my floor for like 7 months...never thought to use it, and still wasn't sure, but you know I really enjoy her company, she could end up being a really good friend. The more I listen to this Mae cd, the more I like it, you know they are a really good band....at first I thought they were just a typical boy emo band, but not really they are like Our Lady Peace meets Alien Ant Farm. really tight if you ask me

I really like this song by Mae...and a side note I wont be rating bands...I will be rating songs, and how I relate to them...the next set being from...Mae Artist: Mae Album: Destination: Beautiful Song: This Time Is The Last Time Save yourself. Because the only thing that matters is that you get away from the pain and the thought of losing your mind. Don't blame yourself. It was everyone around you who made you act this way. There's the stage and your chance to watch it go down. Don't fake yourself into ever, ever thinking about yesterday. That was then, this is now. Don't call it undone. Don't take what you've been dealt. You can exit out the back and make your getaway before anyone can see the damage you have done. This time is the last time so be here, here now. This time is the last time. Somehow make it through. State your case. You've got everyone's attention. What can you say? Thanks or forget what you've been given. Take your place. Do you think that you deserve the best of everything? We don't get why you're here. Can you figure it out? This time is the last time so be here, here now. You've got to get away. Oh, I get lost in the thought of losing you. You've got to get away. I know it's a dream but it must be true. Wave now goodbye. It's the lesson that you've been given. You can always move on to better things. This time is the last time so be here, but be here now. This time is the last time somehow. This time is the last time so be here, but be here now. This time is the last time. Somehow make it through. This song really reminds me of the whole predicament with Allie...on one hand I really don't want her friendship, but on the other hand, she acts so innocent around me, and really wants to keep my friendship...I guess she doesn't get that it's what she hides from me that she hides so she won't hurt me, is what hurts. Why do I get myself involved in such predicaments. She tries to keep the friendship going, and I try also, but the best I can do is just distance myself, I don't want to be mean about it, but really she doesn't realize how much what she does is getting to me, I used to be able to shrug it off. I shouldn't stew over it, you know "dwell in the past" like a great Woman I know once said, but this isn't the past in this case, she is still putting me through hell. Maybe it's just me interpreting the situation all wrong, maybe I am just getting the wrong feeling of how this should be, but seriously when someone says they love you, I don't know what to think. In my generation we don't even know what love is, apart from those of us who know God, I mean she would tell me she loves me...but really? does she isn't love neverending, isn't it patient....Maybe I shouldn't "black sheep" her because of her faults, but everyone is just hitting home on me, causing me a great deal of stress here and there. I got one more song for Allie....and that should be good, well actually 2....oh fine, you guys will let me do 2 right? Artist: Mae Album: Destination: Beautiful Song: Summertime Summertime, summertime brought me back to thinking you were mine all those times. We laid it down and left it all behind, we were blind. Oh, the summertime. We could ride, we could ride. Take my hand and watch the world go by. Laugh or cry, well we need to try, get off the line, time to fly. Oh, the summertime. Go on ahead and let it fade away. No looking back you know the past will stay. It's you and me, we could get out of here. Jump in and go and we could drive for years. We could feel alive... Here we are, here we are, windows down we see a shooting star. Stop the car. Waiting for nothing but our beating hearts, going far. Oh, the summertime. So feel the air, feel the air, take the map and point to anywhere. I don't care. Fingers through your hair, the sky I've seen is blue and green. Oh, the summertime. Driving away, leaving it all behind. Driving away, just driving away. Really, my friendship with Allie was like a neverending summer for awhile...then we came back down to earth, realized both of us weren't as perfect as we thought we were, I had flaws (hey don't we all), as did she, and we realized that we were just really idle-minded. But she was intent on saying she loved me, and tried to convince me that she did, she still tells me, but what is her love? She tells me she loves her online Boyfriend who she has never met? which is absolutely ridiculous, and don't give me the whole "How can you love God, if you never met him?" arguement, ask him yourself, I have talked with God, and met him, he knows who I am. Yeah, her boyfriend is convinced he is a romantic, but in reality all he is a guy, who wants a girl with some chest and a nice rear, he just wants her for the wrong reasons. and then he says he is looking for love, yeah obviously in the wrong way, I spoke to him about all that was going on, apparently he was coming up at the end of this month, and still is, for his sake, and my respect to the sancticty of what is said in private I won't repeat what he said, all I can say is that...Allie is more shallow than I thought. All I will say is that....they are both craving, and impulse driven, mindless and co-existing only as a business transaction relationship "I will do this, if you do this, and then I will say I love you if you do, and yeah don't forget I will hate you if you don't". Get this...she felt that I didn't need to know that he was coming up...frankly I don't care what she does with him, just the fact that she believed that I hated him so much, that it would kill my friendship with her if I knew...is what hurt me there...she has me all wrong, she thinks I am as shallow as her....like said before how do I get myself into these binds. And Like I promised...one more song: Artist: The Agony Scene Album: The Agony Scene Song: Habeas Corpus stabwounds will take their toll murderer with her smile and as an afterthought she kept the heart he gave her beauty can be so cruel she once swore him forever to make good on her word ensured he'd never leave her she lies and whispers loving words he lay bleeding on this floor a sigh a kiss will end his pain and (she) drives the blade deeper still come closer to me crimson streaks the pale skin of her face from the spray of blood from his throat his eyes ever questioning why she swore never to leave him That's exactly what happened with Allie and I, except it was more proverbial then anything. She said she loved me, swore that she wouldn't lie to me, and asked me to never do the same, she told me she loved, while going around stabbing me in the back, then again she convinced me to come back, I decided that maybe I loved her, Though it ended up with her stabbing me in the back again. Is it really worth the pain? is there really something to come out of this half-way friendship.

" Ok, I went to their concert, they seemed like nice guys, I talked to Michael and the Bassist for a minute, they seemed like nice guys once again. But what im getting at is that I am sick and tired about people ragging on their lyrics, ....I really dont know what the lyrics were inspired by or written for but I find them uplifting in a way, dont get me wrong I don't care if you all think that I am Morbid. For all we know, these songs are just their way to express situations, ...I am sure at least one of you has written a dark or Harrowing poem, haven't you? I will give my outlook on a couple of their songs: We Bury our Dead at Dawn: I have no idea what its supposed to be, but it seems like a car accident occured, and now she looks at herself, and how it changed her. Or perhaps metaphorically a Girl who had a really big issue in life that got to her, and changed her. I see it as a song about change and getting used to what it does Lines of Suicide: A song about angst, lacking. Someone who is jaded, and has problems piled up on them, and is just now seeing that perhaps what they were doing to fix the problems wasn't right. Habeas Corpus: I see this metaphorically (it doesnt matter to me how you all see it), This song strikes me as a song about ....well someone stabbing you in the back...i can relate to it, I thought I loved a girl and she stabbed me in the back. That's how i see it, two people that disagreed on thinking that their thoughts were mutual, and one proving that they weren't When you look at the lyrics under a different light, they take on a new kind of uplifting form. As Christians we shouldn't be so fast to judge others' people just express themselves in different ways. I am not saying that I am perfect, in Christ we are made perfect, I live to follow God. I really don't know what this band believes, as I was about to ask Michael, I hesitated, and lost my chance, unsurity in my spirit. Not to go off on too much of Tangent here, but we shouldn't hesistate in asking people about their life, and God's impact on their lives, or even if they believe in him. I know I do. " -- Sean Richer (My Quote for the Day)

If I hear one more person scold me for saying Oh My God, then I will seriously have a nervous fit about it. I mean come on, it's not sacreligious or anything ...let's analyze it. Oh = Sudden Reaction. My = Referring to me, or being of mine, or something that is related to me. God = He who I believe in. As a whole it's saying, "What's going on", like a sudden revelation of the fact that we don't know what we are doing, or what's going on. So yeah, debate me on anything, I can't guarantee you that I could win, but I could probably make a good attempt at doing so.

Day 6 of ..Day 1 : In the Life of Poster Boy : Whacked Up Weekend : Tantalizing Offers I had finally recovered from that crazy day I had spent with Andrea. Who knows what could have happened if we didn't hang out. Well she did some explaining as to who the Flashlight Mafia is, and what they do. More or less a rag tag, motley crew of well people that are going Sane, from the lack of positive ways to decrement their Sanity. Dangerous if you ask me, they plotted to take over the world once, but that didn't work at all. They seem to think that I can do it. Elicia called me the other day, saying something about needing me to do something for her. She had some strange attachment to me, something along the lines of us never thinking the same thing about eachother, oh come on. Then she made some implication of us sneaking off, I simply laughed at her, Andrea would kill me, if she caught us.
And for all of you that were wondering,The whole life of Poster Boy is 2% fictional, for all of you that care to know.

Well back to Day 2 of ...day 1.

Day 2 of ..Day 1 : In the Life of Poster Boy : The Morning After : I need a Pill Well I woke up this morning to realize that the bite marks were still there, you know it's not every day you are bitten by a beautiful, gorgeous, girl, at least not in my life, and probably not in Tim's or Nathan's or Aaron's or Jeff's...well maybe Jeff's life but you know "hey", we don't go there. Well so I decided to call up that girl, and well this is how it went: Sean :*583-5879* *rings* Wombat Princess : Hello? Sean : Hey, is the umm...Wombat Princess there? Wombat Princess : Excuse me!? Sean : well is she in? Wombat Princess : I do have a name you know! Sean : I'm sorry, what was it again? I'm bad at names. Wombat Princess : Well you didn't bother to find out did you. I didn't think so, speechless I see Sean : well, I will call again later then k? Wombat Princess : You think you can just call me and use my number and me to pass time whenever you want? Well think again, because that's not how it works around here, either you call and talk, or don't talk at all! Sean : Well you see, I can't talk to someone whose name I don't know Wombat Princess : Well then why won't you ask already, and stop with that attitude Sean : well umm. Wombat Princess : Don't look at me in that tone of voice! Yeah and my name is Andrea, you didn't bother to ask *Phone Hangs up* Well yeah it didn't go as well as I would have hoped, I will probably call her later, maybe it will end in something useful. or something. Well hmmn, I suppose I will go to Clark now, start my daily madness. Well I arrived in the computer lab once again, to notice that their was a hole in the ceiling from where the Wombat Princess...err Andrea Eclipsed the sun light. Hmmn, well nothing really happened while I sat there, I just watched as people went about doing their business in public...really I don't think people should have the right to their business in public, you know what I am saying? Doing private business in a public computer lab, is absolutely wrong. I looked out and saw, a large open room, and that point the bite mark started to ache, I wanted to run, I really wanted to run into that room. So I did, run into that room, as I said. Of course security came after me, threatening me, so I burst out the window, and fell on the ground, I brushed myself off, and kept on going..maybe I could find a way to make it all seem right. I kept on running, security was hot on my tail still, nothing much I could do but run, ...in a very fast manner. Security caught up to me, and pinned me down, and held a gun to my head and told me "Dhon't mhoove Greengo." Then I realized to myself, that this indeed was not Security, but the Cuban Drug lord that I had warned my friend about earlier that morning. Shoot! Pedro found me, "Pedro, it's me Sean!." "Sean...Sean...Sean...?? Oh yeah sorry man, I didn't recognize you with that bite mark on you right upper arm." Well yeah Pedro and me got stuff settled so yeah, security was still coming up. So we hopped in Pedro's car, and drove off, he told me that he was part of a secret society, of well underground organized sanity. What in the world, a Sanity Cult, known as the Flashlight Mafia, and he was a Godfather there. What is up with that. When we got there I looked around, and I swore I saw Andrea. So I walked up and talked to her, and well she kind of sat there in her seat and gave me a really odd look, so I called at her some more times, and she finally said "IM NOT ANDREA, she was my missing sister that showed up the other day, I'm Elicia" At that point I felt really stupid. Well From the looks of it the Flashlight Mafia needed me, because I broke the madness that had enslaved poor Andrea. So the initiation went through, they made me drink 8 glasses of water, then read a couple pages of this book The Philosophy of Time Travel and watch that movie Donnie Darko , and then let me go home. Sean : *583-5879* *rings*....*rings about 10 more times* Andrea : Hey Sean Sean : Hey Andrea, how's it going? Andrea : Oh my God, you remembered my name! Sean : of course I di.. Andrea : YOU REMEMBERED MY NAME!!!!! Sean : well it's not really that big of.. Andrea : Yes it is, yes it is to me Sean : Well I met your sister, Elicia today Andrea : oh, the Merm. Sean : ...umm ok? Andrea : she is horrible, stay away from her Sean : Well I wasn't planning to... Andrea : that's what they all said....*mumbles* and all those bones Sean : Pardon? Andrea : Nothing, don't worry about it. But hey, I got to go here soon, you want to hang out tommorow? Sean : Sure from there the conversation got better, and yeah I guess we are hanging out tommorow

" Psycho-Joust: Tokyo's End " Guess what you all? I finally got to talk to Katrina last night, I felt so happy, because yeah we don't talk near as much, yeah it is my fault, but hey at least we talk now. I need to have an alternate life as my super hero self "Poster Boy". What will I have to make me different. One of those 'Cat in the Hat' hats, some blue quartz lens glasses, and a gas mask. Yeah. Day 1 of ..Day 1 : In the Life of Poster Boy : Foul Awakening : The Wombat Princess Eyes opened wide, at the crack of dawn, to hear the subtle soothing sounds of Fold Zandura as I awakened. Rushed I traversed to my shower, and returned roughly an hour later, I then flew down my flight of stairs, grabbed my proverbial feast, and flew out the door. Glancing across the freeway I could see many cars caught in gridlock, I did not mind as I flew past. Sadly to my luck, I flew straight into a rain storm, What is up with me. Forced to land, I landed on Clark's Campus, and now I am here, in the Computer Lab. To my dismay in ran a Hulking Brute of a Wombat, I had to take it on, I needed to take it on. I ran straight at it also, my trusty Digipen Pen held high, I lunged, and the Wombat dodged. To my surprise the crazy creature opened it's jacket to reveal to me it had a large supply of Medical Syringes? It pulled out one that was Labeled "Really Bad XXX" and charged at me once again, I was too late to dodge, and it Jabbed me hard in my right arm. I let out not an ear piercing, pants wetting scream, but rather a yell of...Confusion. The wombat forgot to take the Syringe out of it's sleeve so I was hit by a blunt object in a stabbing manner. As I fell to the ground, the Wombat lept high into the sky, and eclipsed the Sunrise. Everything got dark, and damp at that moment, maybe it was because it was raining, but then the Wombat bit me in the arm, leaving a deep wound. Within Seconds the Wombat, turned into a fair Maiden, "Thank you, you have freed me of the curse", I responded with a simple "And what would that be?" Apparently she was under some curse that turned her into a Wombat, and could not be turned back until she successfully defeated someone in combat, then bit their right upper arm. I really just sat their amazed, and shocked as to how stupid it seemed for a Wombat to turn into a Fair Maiden. Apparently she is the Fabled Wombat Princess I had seen before only in fairy tales. I left her there, she gave me her phone number, and insisted on me calling her later so her insurance company could contact me and pay the medical bill for my injury. I went to sleep that night, thinking about the beautiful Wombat Princess, that bit my right arm, and offerend to pay my Medical bills. No girl, had ever done that for me before, then again along those same lines, no girl had ever been a Wombat in front of me before. Good point. I layed in bed, eyes closed and drifted off into a dream land. I could see a boy, with a " One of those 'Cat in the Hat' hats, some blue quartz lens glasses, and a gas mask " and he looked sad. He was laying in a corner crying, his arm was beginning to glow where it was bitten. He only sat their grimacing in pain, not sure what to do. He eventually got up, sick of the pain, and began to run, began to run into the nothingness, not sure where he was going, he only wanted to go. Sick of the pain, sick of the mocking, sick of it all, he wanted to leave it all behind. He stopped running and looked down at his arm to see the pain was leaving, the glowing stopped, and he felt full of energy. Afterwards I thought to myself, what a queer and uncanny dream. Well it turned out that that wound which I suffered empowered me, I now am full of energy. I am now Poster Boy , not really a defender of Justice, but really just a defender of my own rights, ...not selfish, but simply ego-centric. POSTER BOY AWAY!!

Well yeah I was talking to Trish last night, very odd though, I ended up being some sort of Communal rite of Passage, they were Communally approving of me, and passing me on. I found it so very odd, I called for Trish, and Phil answered so I talked to him. Then Trish walked by, so I talked to her. Then she got kicked off, so I talked to Phil some more, then April for a second, then back to Phil. Later April decided to find out what the obsession with Sean was, so the April took the phone from the Phil, and talked to The Sean. Which was very interesting, we have a lot in common as I found out, I suppose their whole family relates to me somehow. Either way, it all works.

Location: Washougal The Holy Empire of Neo-Midian is a small, socially progressive nation, renowned for its compulsory military service. Its hard-nosed, hard-working population of 7 million have some civil rights, but not too many, enjoy the freedom to spend their money however they like, to a point, and take part in free and open elections, although not too often. The small government concentrates mainly on Religion & Spirituality, although Commerce and Education are on the agenda. Citizens pay a flat income tax of 8%. A robust private sector is led by the Uranium Mining, Soda Sales, and Retail industries. Voting is voluntary and Animal Liberationists are regularly jailed. Crime is a problem, and the police force struggles against a lack of funding and a high mortality rate. Neo-Midian's national animal is the Penguin with a Shotgun, which teeters on the brink of extinction due to widespread deforestation, and its currency is the Crystal Shard. World Fact Book Concerning Washougal : The land of the Train Tracks, and the Home of Safeway. World Renowned for it's fine cuisine, and excellent view of the train tracks, join Washougal we love company. Come see our excellent MX Tracks, and Escape the Camas Mill. We have the world's finest sewage refinement. When asked people respond by saying "uhhhhh, really green, rainy, scenic. "out there" ". Infact here is a local right now: "Hell" Well that is what they had to say, a land of Polar opposites, and Fine Women. Come to Washougal Today

Title: Anxiety in Damnation Lyrics: Me (Sean Richer) Open up my eyes, trite my purpose, burning in the flames, let me see once again, love that was lost, the sparks that flew crashing and falling, bouncing and rebounding, resurrected my face will kiss the sky, night rises to give me more,

That dark day still echoes in my mind, when hell broke loose in my life. I could have resisted it, and made every dream come true, and gotten somewhere, yet, I failed and didn't allow it, why? Why do I value loyalty to ones that love me, as opposed to loyalty to those that I love. Why do I violate the friendships that I have, to get those that will never prosper.

This Bloody nation is annoying me. To be anywhere successful you have to be beautiful, have an incredible body, somehow know how to sing, be able to bench a truck and carry a note. This is insane, I am not complaining because I am inadequate, maybe I am, but that is not the issue. In the past, meaning yesterday, I would have said that musicians and actors are over payed, well I would liek to see just anyone try that, it's hard stuff. Not world changing yet hard. Some people are simply over payed in our eyes, but at one time I suppose they had the same issue that we had you know, they might have been in the same boat and they are out. So why can;t we support them, are we simply fools or something. Why does music have such manipulative powers over teh masses, why is that, I don't understand. How can one song come out, a band go triple platinum, then everyone owns the cd, what happened to individuality, whatever happened to that? I want to succeed yet everything drives me into the ground. Every attempt is stopped, well you watch me world, I will succeed, and I will show you up, and watch me you'll be damned if I don't succeed, why should I Depend on the masses why can't they depend on me? Why do I have to be forced to give into Urges on account of what the world thinks. Why do they throw it at me wherever I go. Why does Emo and Nu-Metal (Melodic metal, synth metal, metal emo) have such power over us. I don't understand, what do we need to be "there", why are we judged as to when we get "there". I mean I have wasted my life trying to be "there", well you know what that is wasted because even people that are "there" in our eyes claim that "there" is somewhere else.

Looking at Evanescence, they sound a lot like the Agony Scene, somehow ....The Agony Scene, Soul Embraced, Evanescence, and Skillet should tour. That would be incredible. I mean hmmn, like I would go. WHOA. If Amy did some guest vocals with the Agony Scene, Soul Embraced, Afflicted, or Still Breathing that would be hella sweet.
Well I am out of here, see you all later. Keep cool

Bought the New Skillet CD, Fingernails is my favorite song so far, haven't listened to the part of the cd after that, been on repeat so long. Their new sound is more like Korn added to System of a Down, with a Dash of Marilyn Manson, some Disturbed, and of course some classic old school Skillet, but not near as whiny as they used to be. I know a lot of people that cannot stand Korn, well you know what, I love his voice, if I sang like that I would be him, I have my own voice, distinct, maybe a little obnoxious yet it works. "I'm a vampire, up against the wall....Bring the Chaos." Random things I know. I also bought the East West cd, Vintage, not near as good as the Skillet CD, but you know for 9.98 you can or cannot go wrong, next time I am buying the Astronomy (Bleach), or Cheeses of Nazareth (Five Iron Frenzy) cds.

So if I were to look out my window, and see a black sun rise, would I still have you in my heart, would I still be able to hold you as it growled in the sky, setting only to leave me alone, solitude is where I live, silence my only requiem, solitude is where I live, silence is my only requiem, you stole my happiness, replaced with Madness I smiled, teardrops tearing through what was left of the battered lives, alone they cry, "where is our salvation, where is our rite", there lives torn in half, their minds left only to wrought the iron that remained, why did it grow cold, why were we ripped apart, why has this plagued me, and why can't I start, this villainy I once knew as life, the young girl no longer knocking at my hearts door, no longer wishing to never be born, she tore herself a lock of hair, as to which by hold me dear, well no longer can I stand, this salt burning at my scalp, the thoughts scraping at my skin, can I no longer stay, written to be confused, written to confuse, written out of confusion, my last hopes hold on and linger near, let them come close, let them hug my soul, let them embrace my very being only to leave and let me go, in this town I grew, in the town I burdened my life, let me pass with simplicity, let these people only know what is near, strength to pass between them, and know that what I did was not wrong, and where I was going was not in vain, let me know my love was not violated, and taken aback, please let me continue, I will not suffer these pains, for no contrived reason, I remain

Well ....Merry Christmas you all, it's almost here. Somehow this year, I could care less, I mean I know it's the time we celebrate the Lord's birth and all. But somethign doesn't seem right...this year I could care less about all the traditions associated with it, I noticed around Thanksgiving, that traditions exist. and really I see no point in them, what is the purpose of gathering people that don't want to be gathered, to see people they don't want to see, to eat food they don't like, to talk to people they would rather hate the majority of the year, what kind of discombobulated universe do we live in? Why do people force themselves on people, why does rape exist, and why don't people understand enough when it is enough. If clingyness is a character trait, how do you break it, without scaring the person you are clinging to....come on. Really odd. Like here I am now faced with the fact that the person that I tried to understand more than anyone, their friendship was in beginning a ploy to get rid of me from someone else, who now laments the loss of my friendship with her. I mean....somehow I think that Women are somehow at my Achilles' heel yet not the heel, as though they talk to me in my sleep and exploit what little sanity I have left. What is the purpose of digging in deep under my skin only to make me go mad, why is that?

That's one person I will miss alot when I leave. We used to talk alot, but life happens as does cause and effect and thus we have to move on. I remember I once swore that I would rescue her from her dad when I got my license, here I am ...still no license, and she is still living in hell. ...yet another reason I need my license.

Hmmn, the human mind is alot stronger than I thought. I mean I always assumed it to be weak and powerless. Though, if you are not careful it can grab hold of you really hard. I didn't realize that without food, I can't keep my mind in check, I simply don't have the energy needed to keep it occupied, and instead to goes purely mad. You know my whole theory on Carnality being potentially, inversely proportional to the fatigue involved. well it seems as though energy seems to play a part in it also, at least, the lack thereof. Katrina and I have both talked once or twice while we were tired, and yeah it gets insane. Well imagine that times....well the biggest number you can think of, and that graphically is what you get. It was surely insane. That Dream hit my like a brick wall, and yeah shook me up awfully bad.

I never knew fasting could be so mentally taxing. My mind broke, then within a little while, my body broke. This has never happened before, and the opposition was getting to me, I mean, I don't understand what is going on, something doesn't want me to do this, and well, it stopped me. Whether or not that dream meant anything, dreams generally are produced in your mind, and while fasting you are both purging you mind and your body. Well this is the first time the carnality of my mind wouldn't let me go, the dream showed it was not about to leave any time soon. I feel like there is two of me living in here. One side, I long to banish, and another I have yet to birth. Reminds me of that Clive Barker painting "I am borne of myself" or whatever, a woman giving birth to herself....really odd if you ask me
Hey what's hanging. Strange dream last night, my carnal mind wouldn't let down, i felt as though I was under attack.....constantly

Wel you know what, I guess thats the price you pay for ambition, and I will pay it gladly, to hell with complacency, to hell with ignorance, and to hell with submission. I have been submissive my whole life allowing people to think for me, I will think for myself from now on. They will all pay.

The Lance of Longinus, The crucifixion, and the semi-spontaneous not necessarily virgin birth's were taken straight out of the bible. k as for that dream, here it goes: I was sitting in these open plains, the area was understood to have a round enclosure. There was bushes all around. The area wasn't grassy, but it was understood to have some sort of vegetation, the land was fertile but not touched yet, it was dry but not parched. I myself, was some sort of small thing, it reminded me a lot of Vince from Voodoo Vince, but I wasn't a doll, nor vince. I was running around aimlessly inspecting these strange rod like things on the ground, from their size I could only grip one at a time. I looked around...thoughts on my mind being "fire bush" or some melange of words along those lines. I climbed up the mound of what seemed to be sandy dirt and stood there. I could see 5 holes, that whenever I looked at one a small halo like yellow circle hovered above. Not sure what to do, I saw one of those rods laying around the mound, picked it up, and shoved it inside one of the halos, and into the hole. To my surprise the mound shook and what seemed to be ludacrous happened, it happened that where I was standing was the head of a dragon made of...well dirt and sand. the head reared, flailed around then spewed fire around, igniting one of those fire bushes. The dragon then calmed it self, and returning it's head back into a mound. It was then understood that I had to repeat this till all the fire bushes were lit. Why I had to do any of that...I don't remember seeing, the dragon..why? I am not sure either, probably one of my most cryptic dreams yet. Kind of like that dream of that beast that was killing people...catholics i believe, then the priests began to deny that anyone was killed, and denied the existence of that beast. really odd yet again.

Before I get to the dream, All you Evangelion fans out there reading this, Send me an Email @ urlLink Here and let me know what you think of this new upcoming movie deal. What i was getting at, was that walking around here at the USGS, with personnel everywhere, makes me feel like I am working at NERV, and that somewhere here there is some sort of sick lab somewhere that is building machines or something...who knows..random thought for the day

Ok, here we go, another thing to get me riled in our day and age. Society is full of "stupid." Literally, and that in essence is a problem in itself, like come on...really. We fear that things are going to scare children. Well first let's define children. One-Dimensional dependent minds latching onto whatever goes their way, with little discernment. "Don't see this movie, it scares children," is probably something that bothers the hell out of me, not to mention the negativity of it but look at it. We assume that all children are the same, and we limit other peoples' children the way we would limit our own. But why? Don't they have their own free will to do as they choose with their children. We are dealing right now (people born between 1985 and 1990) with a screwed up Generation, and why you ask, because we let people like Disney run our lives. It's a known fact that people these days could care less about disciplining our Children. I mean we are disciplined for disciplining them, stripped of our rods, then told that when the children go awry and screw up society it's our fault. But why? We have a generation that is wired into technology, and grown up based on fairy tales that are so convoluted, so stripped of their own dignity that they are forced down the throats of these children. Look at all these tales, Cinderella, Little Mermaid, Beauty and the Beast. All those, Disney took, removed the original moral undertones, replaced them with filth, added singing inanimate objects, then went ahead and stripped out all forms of Spiritual development. In addition to those problems we deal with the fact that our Adults are busy working 40 hour a week jobs, both parents, to buy the highspeed internet, cable television, plasma monitors, and PS2s our children need so they don't :Rape, steal, pillage, plunder....etc. Fairy tales, and all literature is meant to be monitored, and guided..seriously, without some sort of Elder guidance, it leaves one to grow up in a fantasy. Don't get me wrong, children with limits and overbearing, sheltering parents, and those that do read, and don't watch "movies" on account of the fact that "all that is on TV is SEX" are still equally at fault. First let me go to the Children who are sheltered. They will suffer one of the biggest falls themselves, and blame their shortcomings on themselves thinking that they are not worthy, when it is the parent itself that is unworthy. We are supposed to propagate individual independent thought, Naive nature is good, but the excess that Sheltering provides will shatter a child's hopes and dreams when they experience what the world has to offer. Parents that often shelter their children, do so often because they don't have time to raise their children the way they should be raised. A growing period in which you are constantly shut down, and not praised/scolded in the right ways will screw with you. An example would be a Child that felt that he or she was in love, and that this amiable bond was broken, they feel inadequate, lost, broken, and worthless. I would say is based on Oedipal bonds, if the parents were never really there to explain love, or warn of what society may offer as love, the Child will be all the more susceptable to it. Children that aren't allowed to watch films, or television. That could get me going for days. I myself am not dependent on TV, but that is something that you have to come to a conclusion for yourself. Raising children saying that films and television are evil, is more or less seeding ignorance into the child. I mean come on, if you are seriously worried about your child's tv viewing, sit down with them and discuss it. So at least the 2 of you know what you are getting into, even if it means you have to put off working overtime to get that bentley that you so "desperately" need to be happy. For that matter if you think things of this world will keep you happy, you are in for such a cataclysmic realization, i will simply leave you to it yourself. Overall what I am saying is, Parents spend more time with your kids. Don't only show them the good side of life, the happy things and what not, they will be let down and angry at you and moreso themselves when they find out that Life isn't all rainbows and flowers, that life throws curve balls, and that trials and tribulations are to come. Let them know who to turn to, and what to do with their lives. on the same token, don't only show the what is wrong with life, or you will have such a Existential dilemma on your hands, you won't know how to deal with it.

You know what gets you the most, it's that you hold on the hardest, the tightest when you believe so deeply that you have lost the cause that you were holding on for. Ever wonder why people are the way they are, Ties strengthen as destruction presents itself. Picasso was right, Destruction is a direct byproduct of Creation. As things strengthen, it's only so they can be tested and broken once again.

Sean here, just going mad right now, I need something to give me some sort of sanity. All of a sudden, things constrict on me. What i can do, what I can't do, what I play, what i watch, suddenly it's all being pulled away. Why did it have to strike me now, suddenly I am fragile and frail and cannot fend for myself. Normally I would be straining to not let go, but this is ridiculous, suddenly I am not competent. I am not looking for pity, I am looking for answers beyond "Because I am your parent" or "Because you are my child," when i was younger i could take such answers but now i can't tolerate it.

You all probably remember my post on Cockatrices so here it is again

Of Centaurs, Cockatrices and Dragons This gets so much stranger. I obviously don't read my bible enough, if I read these verses correctly: Isaiah 11:8 And the sucking child shall play on the hole of the asp, and the weaned child shall put his hand on the cockatrice' den. Isaiah 14:29 Rejoice not thou, whole Palestina, because the rod of him that smote thee is broken: for out of the serpent's root shall come forth a cockatrice, and his fruit shall be a fiery flying serpent. Isaiah 59:5 They hatch cockatrice' eggs, and weave the spider's web: he that eateth of their eggs dieth, and that which is crushed breaketh out into a viper. In a way it shows that the bible claims that Cockatrice's really do / did exist. This is very interesting, I am not sure what to say, I thought they were simply myths, but I suppose they do/did exist. Numbers 21:6 And the LORD sent fiery serpents among the people, and they bit the people; and much people of Israel died. Whatever was at that point in Number's sounded much like a Dragon of sorts, or somethign like that. Actuall Isaiah 14:29 seems to hint at Cockatrice's fathering Dragons...this is getting insane. Hmmn another reference to the Fiery [flying] serpent. Isaiah 30:6 The burden of the beasts of the south: into the land of trouble and anguish, from whence come the young and old lion, the viper and fiery flying serpent, they will carry their riches upon the shoulders of young asses, and their treasures upon the bunches of camels, to a people that shall not profit them. As does Psalm 91:13 Thou shalt tread upon the lion and adder: the young lion and the dragon shalt thou trample under feet. Isaiah 27:1 In that day the LORD with his sore and great and strong sword shall punish leviathan the piercing serpent, even leviathan that crooked serpent; and he shall slay the dragon that is in the sea Isaiah 51:9 Awake, awake, put on strength, O arm of the LORD; awake, as in the ancient days, in the generations of old. Art thou not it that hath cut Rahab, and wounded the dragon? Even stranger, I look at Jeremiah 51:34 , and I am beginning to lose it at this point. This says "he hath swallowed me up like a dragon ." How can the Bible keep on referencing these Dragons, they must exist/ existed at some time. Well, I dont know if I should even mention Revelations as far as beasts go, that gets even stranger. Revelation 12:3 , actually mentions what I believe to be a hydra, that means so far, the Bible has affirmed the existence of Cockatrice's, Dragons and Hydras, which is oh so strange. In Revelation 12:7 , Michael is said to have had war with the Dragon, which again is said to be called a Dragon, saying once again that Dragon's existed. Don't worry though.. It get's stranger, Revelation 9:7-10 Speaks of Locusts that " 7 And the shapes of the locusts were like unto horses prepared unto battle; and on their heads were as it were crowns like gold, and their faces were as the faces of men. 8 And they had hair as the hair of women, and their teeth were as the teeth of lions. 9 And they had breastplates, as it were breastplates of iron; and the sound of their wings was as the sound of chariots of many horses running to battle. 10 And they had tails like unto scorpions, and there were stings in their tails: and their power was to hurt men five months." Yeah sounds incredibly like The Sphinx to me, or some sort of Centaur thing. Very odd if you ask me, very odd. Oh and get this, they have a king, known as Abaddon to the Jews, and Apollyon to the Greek. The Bible said that he was Apollyon to the Greek, which acknowledges the fact that the Greek existed. So I wase more or less right in saying there were indeed Dragons, Cockatrices, and Leviathans, and to a lesser degree the Greek were right in saying Centaurs existed. I would have to say that I do believe the Greek based their mythology on what really was happening. Nonetheless, I find it very odd that the Bible mentioned Cockatrice's I had heard that name once more, and that was it. The Bible doesn't say much about them, but it does mention that they have Dens, and are at the Root of Dragons. The Bible mentions that the fruit of the Cockatrice is indeed a fiery flying serpent, which for the sake of simplicity I would say is a Dragon indeed. Completely away from the Bible I read about the Cockatrice this morning, as being the "king" of serpents, which the Bible reinforces, if it is True that Dragons are the fruit of Cockatrices, then yes they would have to be "kings" of serpents. You all know of Centaurs and Dragons, but not many of you know of Cockatrices, I will now explain for all of you that are remotely lost. Cockatrices, are born of the eggs of birds, and are some how part snake, part bird, AND they have a devasting gaze, and breath. So very odd. Really any feedback would be nice, if possible

Vampirism, Lycanthropes, Undead Vs. Christianity Hmmn, I have come to a conclusion that Vampirism would be a disease if contracted, well actually a Virus. Well I am not sure, whether it would be a bacteria or a Virus, I mean seriously, look at vampirism. Is it transferred by blood or not? That is a good question. I believe it is, I suppose by the same right that a Vampire transfers it through the transmission of blood, the child of a vampire, conceived after becoming a vampire, would also be a vampire. Thus Vampirism would have to be a blood virus, most likely in the DNA strand. Meaning whatever Vampirism is, the Viral strand would be a really screwed up version of HIV. Or at least have the DNA altering property of HIV. Which would have to be the case with Lycanthropes of all kinds. Although the concept of Undead, is a hard one. I do not believe undeadness could be transferred by blood, it must be a living parasite that causes it. Undead'ness would be a sort of earthly immortality. Then the second premise would be, whether or not the Undead could reproduce. Like what effects would being Undead have on you, it seems to screw you up quite a bit, Vampires and Lycanthropes are not necessarily Undead. I suppose after a long time of being Undead, your mind would rot, you would lose all concept of time and emotion, and be essentially soulless. You would be restless on account of your soul wishing to leave your body far before you plan to die. You would also have an unnaturally long life. Lets look a little deeper into Undeadness now. In addition to Mind Rot , would beauty be preserved, or damned? That is something that has always bothered me. I mean you see some undead, and they are hauntingly beautiful, and then sometimes you see this rotting corpse, that doesn't want to let go of life. Also, how do you kill undead, seriously. I mean you always see Undead raised from the grave, I suppose in that sense, Undead have no souls, and are simply living flesh, much like the lower species. So in that case, Undead are expendable...or are they? The undead raised from the grave would be, and that explains the rot. I suppose for those still alive, Undead would also be a virus. Which would only bear the mind rot and earthly immortality. In Conclusion, I gather that you could possibly, if all this was possible, extract the virus from all 3, and in essence contract all three viruses. I would feel very sorry for the pitiful person that went ahead and pissed you off though. At night you would become some sort of beast that I wouldn't even mess with. So on a side note, could any of these coexist with Christianity? Undead, yes it could, because you could die. Vampirism, was a little shady for me, until I pulled this verse out of the New Living Translation Genesis 9:4 But you must never eat animals that still have their lifeblood in them. That clearly states taht you may not eat the blood of animals, and nowhere states humans. Well I was about to take that Verse and run, until I found this one, which saddened me. Leviticus 3:17 "You must never eat any fat or blood. This is a permanent law for you and all your descendants, wherever they may live." That in itself, means no blood, ever. Well from those we know that life is in the blood, and that we shouldn't drink life, in that life is not ours to give and take. I suppose, in my eyes. Though I did continue searching for Verses, trying to sort this out. Back in Moses' time they would have persecuted Vampires. Levitcus 7:26 Even in your homes, you must never eat the blood of any bird or animal. Leviticus 7:27 Anyone who eats blood must be cut off from the community." Hmmn, that also shows that Vampires would not have been well liked either. For those of you wondering, Leviticus, seemed to be a list of Instructions for Moses to give to the people, not completly laws, but more so guidelines for the people, and more so for the priests so that they would not feel God's retribution when they made sacrifices. Well some more verses, help show me that it gets deeper so. Leviticus 17:10-16 10 "And I will turn against anyone, whether an Israelite or a foreigner living among you, who eats or drinks blood in any form. I will cut off such a person from the community, 11 for the life of any creature is in its blood. I have given you the blood so you can make atonement for your sins. It is the blood, representing life, that brings you atonement. 12 That is why I said to the Israelites: 'You and the foreigners who live among you must never eat or drink blood.' 13 "And this command applies both to Israelites and to the foreigners living among you. If you go hunting and kill an animal or bird that is approved for eating, you must drain out the blood and cover it with earth. 14 The life of every creature is in the blood. That is why I have told the people of Israel never to eat or drink it, for the life of any bird or animal is in the blood. So whoever eats or drinks blood must be cut off. 15 "And this command also applies both to Israelites and the foreigners living among you. For a little while here, I will be pulling more verses, I will eventually return to my discussion. Leviticus 19:26 "Never eat meat that has not been drained of its blood."Do not practice fortune-telling or witchcraft. Well seeing that none of those 3 viruses would be witchcraft you would be safe there, I suppose if you were any of the 3 you would have to learn to live without blood and develop immunities for the lack thereof, becoming, I suppose another race of men, yet still biologically compatible. Deuteronomy 12:16 The only restriction is that you are not to eat the blood. You must pour it out on the ground like water. Deuteronomy 12:23 The only restriction is never to eat the blood, for the blood is the life, and you must not eat the life with the meat. Deuteronomy 12:24 Instead, pour out the blood on the ground like water. More verses speaking against the drinking/eating of blood. Hmmn, but why, I guess more along the lines of only the Lord has the power of Life in his hands. Which would also explain the concept of Infertility, and the Lord's role in Conception. Deuteronomy 12:25 Do not eat the blood; then all will go well with you and your children, because you will be doing what pleases the LORD. Bingo!!!, That's it, Vampires that drink blood, do not please the Lord, that right there helps explain what I am trying to find. about 15 verses later God, has finally begun to say why he does not want us to drink their life. On a side note, it would not be morally right to as a Lycanthrope or a Vampire, to kill "people" in that, that would be murder, which is downtrodden by society, and not looked upon well by the Lord. Deuteronomy 15:23 But do not eat the blood. You must pour it out on the ground like water. more of that pouring out the blood like water, but why like water, and why on the ground, perhaps to say, it's life is not in our hands. We were made from dirt, by our creator, perhaps it would mean, the life of the animal is not our "issue" but simply the issue of the creator. As for why it is the ground, I have no idea. 1 Samuel 14:32 - 34 32 That evening they flew upon the battle plunder and butchered the sheep, cattle, and calves, but they ate them without draining the blood. 33 Someone reported to Saul, "Look, the men are sinning against the LORD by eating meat that still has blood in it.""That is very wrong," Saul said. "Find a large stone and roll it over here. 34 Then go out among the troops and tell them, 'Bring the cattle and sheep here to kill them and drain the blood. Do not sin against the LORD by eating meat with the blood still in it.'" So that night all the troops brought their animals and slaughtered them there. So I suppose, it would be considered a Sin to Drink blood, which I suppose I understand now, because Life is not ours to give and take. Hmmn, I wonder if there are more verses to pull. 1 Kings 18:28 So they shouted louder, and following their normal custom, they cut themselves with knives and swords until the blood gushed out. A little Off Topic, but it would show that Indeed, self mutilation is wrong, later in that chapter, God proves himself, and sends fire from heaven, but that is not our topic of discussion. Ooh ooh, I think I may have found something here of some importance. Isaiah 66:3 But those who choose their own ways, delighting in their sins, are cursed. It would appear that God does not smile upon the Drinkers of blood, because that is sin, and I suppose if you continued it would be delighting in sin, and thus Cursed, and not looked upon greatly by the Lord. So the blood aspect of Vampirism would not be right, so other than that I suppose the Lord would support Vampires. I only have a few more verses coming before I come to a conclusion so hold on. Ezekiel 33:25 Now give these people this message from the Sovereign LORD: You eat meat with blood in it, you worship idols, and you murder the innocent. Do you really think the land should be yours? Ezekiel 35:6 As surely as I live, says the Sovereign LORD, since you show no distaste for blood, I will give you a bloodbath of your own. Your turn has come! Well here, God seems to be saying that because you all drink blood, I will shed all your blood. Maybe, "For you all take life, so I will begin to take your lives." Still only what I perceive. Jeese, this next set of verses completely throws me off. Ezekiel 39:17-22 17 "And now, son of man, call all the birds and wild animals, says the Sovereign LORD. Say to them: Gather together for my great sacrificial feast. Come from far and near to the mountains of Israel, and there eat the flesh and drink the blood! 18 Eat the flesh of mighty men and drink the blood of princes as though they were rams, lambs, goats, and fat young bulls of Bashan! 19 Gorge yourselves with flesh until you are glutted; drink blood until you are drunk. This is the sacrificial feast I have prepared for you. 20 Feast at my banquet table – feast on horses, riders, and valiant warriors, says the Sovereign LORD. 21 "Thus, I will demonstrate my glory among the nations. Everyone will see the punishment I have inflicted on them and the power I have demonstrated. 22 And from that time on the people of Israel will know that I am the LORD their God. That was the punishment, against the armies of Gog and Magog, I suppose that as a whole was saying that the Lord, would take life en masse and prove himself, yet again. Makes you wonder as to when his Enemies would realize that God, and his people are unstoppable. Though that verse advocates the drinking of man's blood, I suppose that is one of the few times that it was 'ok' to do so. Zechariah 9:7 7 They will no longer eat meat with blood in it or feed on other forbidden foods. All the surviving Philistines will worship our God and be adopted as a new clan in Judah. And the Philistines of Ekron will join my people, just as the Jebusites once did. While here in Zechariah, the time for the drinking is once again over. So the Lord seemed to allow it but once. Well here is a twist, look at what he said in Capernum. If Vampirism also, has spiritual aspects, then I think I have found a way for Vampires to continue to live on in peace. John 6:53-58 53 So Jesus said again, "I assure you, unless you eat the flesh of the Son of Man and drink his blood, you cannot have eternal life within you. 54 But those who eat my flesh and drink my blood have eternal life, and I will raise them at the last day. 55 For my flesh is the true food, and my blood is the true drink. 56 All who eat my flesh and drink my blood remain in me, and I in them. 57 I live by the power of the living Father who sent me; in the same way, those who partake of me will live because of me. 58 I am the true bread from heaven. Anyone who eats this bread will live forever and not die as your ancestors did, even though they ate the manna." Well there you go, Vampires may rejoice in the Lord, and follow him to the ends of the Earth, only in Christ may Vampires be completely free of their need to drink Blood of men, or animals. Acts 15:17-21 17 so that the rest of humanity might find the Lord, including the Gentiles – all those I have called to be mine. This is what the Lord says, 18 he who made these things known long ago.' 19 And so my judgment is that we should stop troubling the Gentiles who turn to God, 20 except that we should write to them and tell them to abstain from eating meat sacrificed to idols, from sexual immorality, and from consuming blood or eating the meat of strangled animals. 21 For these laws of Moses have been preached in Jewish synagogues in every city on every Sabbath for many generations." There it is folks, New Testament confirmation, that the Drinking of blood is still not smiled upon by the Lord. Thought maybe some of you may have wanted to see that. Acts 21:25 "As for the Gentile Christians, all we ask of them is what we already told them in a letter: They should not eat food offered to idols, nor consume blood, nor eat meat from strangled animals, and they should stay away from all sexual immorality." It would seem that Vampires that turn to Christ would simply, have to stop consuming blood, they would be fine, and not sinless, but have one less stoppable sin to deal with. 1 Corinthians 11:27 So if anyone eats this bread or drinks this cup of the Lord unworthily, that person is guilty of sinning against the body and the blood of the Lord. The Vampires would have to have accepted Christ into their hearts first though. Which is not hard to do at all, so Vampires would be once again accepted into God's house, with no issues. Well my more or less short, if you will, study on Vampires, Lycanthropes and Undead, has come to a simple Conclusion as to whether or not they may co-exist with Christianity. Vampires, would have to give up the drinking of blood, and simply be freed by the Blood of Christ, Lycanthropes would have to give up the eating of blood, and the Undead, would have to realize their own mortality. Above all, God would accept all 3, and to do so they simply would have to, accept Christ as their Savior, Lord, and Provider and ask Christ to set them free of their sins. Which is the same for any of us. Thank you for reading this far.

Ephesians 6:12 For we are not fighting against people made of flesh and blood, but against the evil rulers and authorities of the unseen world, against those mighty powers of darkness who rule this world, and against wicked spirits in the heavenly realms. So Saturday night, Ellen and I went to the Emery, Watashi Wa, Mewithoutyou, Anberlin concert. That rocked hard, I swear. Emery sounded so clear, I loved it, I kinda only "somewhat" liked them before the concert, and now I absolutely think they rock so hard. Something about 6 Guys being on stage at once, flailing around, with a full array of instruments, that was awesome. Watashi Wa, well let's put it this way, they rock so much harder in concert than on the CD's. The CD's make them seem so.....poppy'ish, in concert it was like whoa, ROCK!!!. They did some police song, "Message in a Bottle" or something. Still confused as to when my band, Mewithoutyou, that I went to see would come out. Halfway into the Watashi Wa thingy, I read a wall thing, that said they were next, and my heart jumped. Mewithoutyou, was probably my fave band there, they are like the beatles, if they dropped after grunge was the scene :). Got a nice sound to them. So they come up, and at the beginning, Aaron is there lying down on the ground, like stretching or sleeping or something, then like he lays there until his part of the song came up, that guy tweaks on stage so much, he RAWKS!!!. So Bullet to Binary was up first, and the masses moved that mosh pit became so insane, it was funny he was like "so yeah...don't hurt the girls or our synth" :) Props to all you reading this that attended, no Props to all you that didn't, cept for Chloe cuz she rocks anyways, thanks for believing in me Girl....and yeah you too Janelle :) (thought I forgot about you eh?) So what about Anberlin, well when they went up ...Ellen and I moved back, so that we wouldn't be stuck in the moshing again :). Anberlin was really good though, I went in only moderately liking them, and came out loving the sound. I can't wait to see them again when they come back with the juliana theory. By the way all Kudo Props to my typing skillz they make me rawk :)

Jerry! Jerry! Jerry! JERRY: Tonight on the Jerry Springer show we have a particularly interesting episode! Sean is here to finally confess something to a long-time friend of his Jimmy. So everyone please put your hands together for Sean! Jerry: Okay, now Sean you're here to talk about someone aren't you? You: Yes. Jerry: And what is this other persons name? You: Allie. The crowd SQUEALS with delight. Jerry: Okay, okay, well Allie, is actually here tonight - The crowd SQUEALS. Jerry: But first we have a surprise for you Sean, because as it happens there is someone else here to see YOU! So let's bring out... Tristian! You: What the HELL!!! Out of nowhere you pull out a Flail. Tristian reaches for the Bed. Out of the shadows Kelly appears. Kelly: Wait everybody wait! Jerry: Yes, everybody let's just calm down for a moment here. First tell us why you're here Tristian. Tristian: Because I saw Sean and Kelly making out at Australia! The crowd goes absolutely INSANE. Kelly: That's a lie! I was home watching Charmed! Jerry: (raising his hands) Hold on, hold on, I'm missing the problem here...what exactly IS the problem Tristian? Tristian: Because I've recently been taking part in a sexual relationship with Jimmy who has recently become engaged to Kelly. The crowd hollers, screams and whoops in an orchestra of orgasmic excitement. Jerry: Okay, okay. Well why don't we bring Jimmy out here because Sean had something that they needed to tell them anyway about... Allie that's right! Jimmy: (enters onto stage and saunters over towards you) What's the deal? I saw you outside getting it on with Allie! You know I'm how I feel about Allie!. Kelly: (screams) What? Why the hell did you ask me to marry you if you're in love with Allie! Jimmy: Because I knew that I could never have Allie. But Sean promised me that they'd never hook up out of respect for my feelings! Kelly: What about respect for MY feelings! Tristian walks suddenly across the stage, embracing Jimmy. Tristian: Don't worry baby, you don't need any of them now that you have me. Again the crowd SQUEALS. Kelly: Oh my God! Are you SICK! Kelly runs across the room and wraps their arms around you tightly. Kelly: Sean take me away from all of this! You: You see? That's the thing...I'm...well, I'm married... The crowd does its bit. Kelly: Married? You nod. Kelly: Who the hell are you married to? When...when did this happen? I don't understand! You: The other day. In Vegas. I'm married to Allie. Jimmy: (screaming) WHAT!!! Jerry: (grinning widely, makes an enquiry) So...did you have a nice wedding night? Allie: (stepping back out onto center stage) Well we had sex 8 times if that's what you mean. The crowd squeals. Jerry: Okay, okay. So let me get this all straight... Sean is married to Allie who Jimmy has secretly been in love with for years and years. Now Jimmy has recently become engaged to Kelly who was recently spotted kissing Sean in the Australia. Now on top of this Tristian has just admitted to being in a sexual relationship with Jimmy. Allie: That's right Jerry. Jerry: (looking sternly into the camera) It is times like these that one has to wonder, whether or not these people are aware that they are quite clinically insane. Perhaps we should be spending more on psychiatric health funds in this country, perhaps we should just ban Vegas to cut down on impulse marriages. Perhaps I should get a new job. Thanks for watching folks it's been great but for now...it's goodnight. Queue cheesy background music and fade to black.

Hello All, Sean in ...Just doing the Sean thing. Sitting around Clark waiting for something strange to happen. Yet I continue to just sit around being me.

Don't think I talked about the Joy Electric Concert I went to on Saturday. Heard Bryan Free, Locust Street Taxi, and Joy Electric. Bryan Free, had the whole gothic eerie, wailing voices going on, it was pretty tight. Locust Street Taxi, that was awsome it was like insane comedy + a concert. Joy Electric, or rather Joy E. Was pretty awsome, kinda sad that his stuff crapped out on him half into it, so he had to go into Joy E. unplugged, which was pretty awesome, talking about life, love, faith, God, his mom, his wife...etc. ie: the good stuff

Was watching the Grammy's last night, they were ok, not something I would watch on a regular basis, but you know, Liberate the Cerebrate. Entering some scholarships this week, poetry, and what not. lol, Not to big on the Grammy's and all, but this year was awesome with George Clinton up there, he rocked.

Well these, next few weeks are going to be chaotic for me, scrambling to get money to pay for college. Any donations would be greatly welcomed. Apparently the National guard will pay $30,000 for tuition. I was looking at a poster today in the hall way, it would give me a chance to become someone for a change, and do something to help someone. I might run it past my parents later. I really don't want to join the military, no anti-american military sentiments here, it's just that...I don't want to be tied down like that. I don't want the power of life and death, as it is, I have been teetering it lately myself. My neighbour just killed herself, 30 years old, I never met the woman. 2 children. It's a little morbid even for me, I know I am one to commonly joke about death. Never had someone, literally "close" to me commit suicide. I mean she lived 2 houses down, we been living next to eachother for 5 years, never met the family at all. Makes you put everything in context I suppose.

Well Hello world, just me in here, being me, doing the things that I like to do. Once again Sean has gotten another deal, It's what he does. He just saved roughly...hmmmn... $202.98 on cds. I love this Sean guy. I am so exhausted

I am naked, (yet so jaded) I'm not broken, yet im not perfect, why, rip away, my skin, and let them dig within, my scalp, (Needles through my eyes), I was lost, still not found. No longer a simple battle, clashing wills (I intend to win), psyches shattering, men conflicting, Sick of all of these games of "let's you and him fight" It's all turned back, over to me, I'm sick of tired of this being pulled on me. Jaded, lost and shattered, broken, beat and tattered, eyes that can burn no longer, wings that beat no more, burn these angels, adorn my crown with their embers, my throat choking down, on their ashes, Il faut que je perde mon vie, Il faut que j'oubli ma douleur, coals, pressed upon my lips, and I saw what I had brought upon myself, (useless sacrifice) inside of me, i have died today and , inside me i've gone another way, toxic feelings, rip apart my skull, useless beatings, down into the ground I fall, wasted emotions.
burn these angels, adorn my crown with their embers, my throat choking down, on their ashes, Il faut que je perde mon vie, Il faut que j'oubli ma douleur, coals, pressed upon my lips,
That said...I can finish my song.

I have all day to write that song. I screwed it up bad, and naturally I have noone on earth to fall to. Though I planned for that, I guess I am sadistic. I know what I am already, proud of it...not really, but it's who I am. What i love is when the rules are layed, and at the end of the game, people sit there and wonder "why did I lose." I say it's because they don't understand the game, others would take pity. I am one of those that would say they don't understand, and try to teach them. Who am I fooling, when every bite I take, every thing I drink, tastes of ash. Something has died/burned inside of me. What I love is how they view me as all together, I know I'm not, so i don't show the side of me, that isn't all together. I still am torn, but why show the torn side? Why sulk amongst others like you lacking what you all need. Denial, denial...let's get something straight here. Looking back at it, thanks to retrospect, I never felt anything for any of them...except 1, only 1 had something they didn't, and I screwed that up. It's not the manipulation where i get off, nor the control issue, it's the concept of destruction. Knowing that somehow, more anguish exists than you alone can handle. No meaning, meaningless, to be honest life is meaningless, it's what you do in life that means something. Though jusn't the end justify the means, or rather creation being simply destruction. I love how I could manipulate my own emotions, I get the most joy out of that, telling myself what I feel, and what I don't feel. Living....what is this living, success is all that matters...it drives me....so I am told. So why do I take what they give me, why do I put up with it. I am sadistic, i have been told that. I begin to love my madness more so on account of the fact that I know how all of this started. I was forced to care. Understand emotions, that's completly an issue in itself, it's not that i don't care, or that worry about being hurt, more along the lines of, I will eventually hurt everyone I know, at least once really badly. I induced it on a couple people, so they woudln't get it later on....it's those who have been through hell with me, that I understand the most. Hypocrisy, my foul mistress, ...my hands have frozen, I can't continue here. regret, anguish, pain, suffering, weakness...that's what i am. I feed off of it, you are what you eat, and I devour, so there. I pull it out of people, they begin to fear those emotions, and what am i left with, their emotions, and they....free of them..temporarily. Is it that bad. Fear of being hurt, there is a good one, of course I fear it, I am human, that kind of thing is natural to me. Jealousy, there is a great emotion, people often confuse my angst with jealousy. And my willingness to care, as harassment. What have I become, what am I these days. All this because a little boy i used to know. his parents were too busy for him, constantly doing things, and sending him places. This boy had no monitoring from his parents, even though they loved him. He was plagued with nightmares, and would scream himself to sleep, so I remember. i took this boy in, too bad that boy died. He was troubled, and had no purpose in life. He was twisted, all he could look up to were his catholic faith, paganistic attractions, tales from the crypt, and corrupted views on paranormal and supernatural. That boy grew up, and was bullied in school, thrown around and tormented. I watched that kid, unable to help him, and he cried to me everynight, and there was nothing i could do. He got into the occult, and used that as a crutch, messing with things he didn't understand, little did he know that the rest of his short life he would be tormented by them. He eventually began to like pain, and began looking up and trying to understand, what caused pain, blood and anguish. No one was there to oversee him, or to watch over him. He delved deep into the world of supernatural and paranormal. A child who wanted so badly to exorcise. He finally snapped, those who tormented him, he waited, until they came at him, he threw them back, he fought with such anger, such angst. In the end it was him who was sent to counselling, him who was calmed down, it was him who had problems. He was held back academically by both his school and his parent. he continued diving deeper into the world he weaved. Stilll plagued by nightmares he continued. His father moved away, and someone he never really new died. He then moved far away in hopes of starting over again, although nothing changed everything was the same, he was still the one they would torment. He eventually met a girl, who set him free, she understood him, and wanted only that he would be happy, too bad she lost him. Time went on and he looked for her 5 or 6 more times, and didn't find her, he was lost, with no one to turn to. And I simply watched. He began to pass time hurting people, in his own anguish, to elevate himself. Then one came to him, one like no other. He helped that one, and that one he. They developed a bond, a binding, and nothing could stop them. Inside he was torn up knowing that he would never be accepted, so he hid what they knew as himself and showed a diferent form, his pain ridden anguish laden side, there would be no pity for him. He saw an opening, took that one's advice, and shot at the very stars that guided him. He wounded visibly wounded 2, even though in reality it was 4 who fell. He had failed, and had lost his purpose. He tried to understand that one, but had lost his chances, asking only for a possiblity to do so, he waivered. Clipped at the wings he fell, alone, broken, he tried turning to the one, ...but she wasn't there this time, he had exhausted his surplus of comrades, and lost everything. That boy died. Now I live his life for him, fixing what he had messed up, hoping to get some purpose. In other words, i am taking responsibilty for what hell I have caused, I looked back at my life and saw how pointless it was, and will now go on life, revitalized and with some purpose, in other words...I'm sorry.
burn these angels, with their embers adorn my crown, my throat choking on this ash

.....so here it is. I admit, i'm sadistic, I breathe hell on people. Can I blame myself though, caring compassionate.....it's weakness in me, I can only be strong. Too long was I held back, controlled, manipulated by people who loved me. Love...there we go there is something that doesn't exist in today's society. By the time I am finished here I will regret what I say. Beasts hand in hand, blades splattered in blood, devouring, hunger, yearning, expression
