Dream last night was really odd, this girl and I were killing people. Then it got stranger and stranger she was gorgeous and all, but it was incredibly strange. I think we were eating something...probably the people. There were 3 creatures, 2 of which shared a symbiotic relationship. There was also a centaur...many centaurs. Lots of arrows, I could feel the arrows flying. War...I felt war. Of those 3 creatures, one was scraggly, yet it was apparent it had a strong build, the other next to it was bigger, and obviously stronger. As for the third creature, all i felt was the essence of Woman, it had a Jewel (dark crimson red...or was it blue) in the center of it's chest, or was it it's head, and had strange runic, ley line, like plating on it, but it seemed like gilding, minus the armor, and simply the gilding. The girl and i killed and killed and killed, it was a movie.....or was it, i couldn't tell. There was this house...2 stories, surrounded by grass, it was either late night or middle of the afternoon, it happened 2 times, still not sure what time of day it was she went in, I was to follow inside was this sort of demonic beast, I believe. It tried to kill me, it terrified me...it terrified me. As for those arrows, I felt I was directing all those arrows, I could feel where they were to fall, and them flying. That beast was foul, all around, gave off this feeling of "Foul." Also there was a strange side menu system going on that,... had some sort of character generation going on. Name Power ?#? ?Beauty ?#? ????? ????? Points ?#? Options ?#? ----------------- There were also some of the options listed...i can't remember names but what they looked like and what they did. They were like ...I guess the "wildcard" innate ability the creatures could have | Some sort of Electric Gem | Some sort of shining thing with a jewel..apparently Mind control | A red jewel, that I guess had some strange...strength power | You could choose the character, Options, I guess equipment as well. Then there were strange sprite versions of it, where you could choose beauty characteristics, and pump points or some thing into changing appearance and statistics. The larger creature could...attack, the smaller one could drain life force...to ...boost the stronger one. I think.

Perhaps a film...A Bloodless, Violence free, Sex free, Vampire film? Could I do it? possibly, Should I?...most likely. But it won't be simple seeing that that sort of thing is not looked upon highly here in America. Everyone here seems to like films with gratuitous nudity, and things of the such realm. I will steer clear of soap opera set ups, and will stay away from audultry and what not. How can one go about making a film about Vampires, and still support what one believes in. Such are the toils of my beliefs. This would have to almost be opposite to any vampire film made today, all of them are put in the vile crude neo-technica set up, in some either far future/far past place with hints of film noirs in every aspect, can't we steer away from that? Doesn't that get old? Don't get me wrong i'm a huge Giger/Carot fan and what not, so I totally understand what's happening. Just come on people cannot we have something different? You ever notice that thing where some girls have that really shiny, either straight or curly hair. No matter what it is, it somehow happens to be shiny, and silky looking. Though some how I wonder myself, have I burned away friendships I don't need, either willingly or passively. I think I may have. I kind of wonder sometimes, where is my life going. are the decisions that i have made really good decisions? Did I do what i was supposed to do, i mean i see every situation as a jumping off point, so everything just gets deeper as we continue. Why did i spend my life indoors as opposed to outside, why do i want people to both love and fear me? The music I listen to, who gave me that standard, have I actually done anythign for myself? The people i know, who gave them to me, did I force my way to them, or did they follow me?

Have you ever met anyone and thought: Ooh, they're a bit strange? Yeah and oddly enough it was Avril Lavigne. She came to one of my shows and we met backstage and I thought she was very, very strange, because she really doesn't have anyone babysitting her. There weren't any bodyguards and I don't know whether that was impressive because she was indepedent, or strange because she doesn't know that somebody might kidnap her, cut of her toes, and sell them to someone like me on E-bay. I found her to be nice... but strange. -- Manson Concerning Avril Lavigne

" THE BIG EMPTY Opens November 21, 2003 John Person (Jon Favreau) is a 30-something struggling actor living alone and facing eviction from his one room apartment in Hollywood. Behind on his rent and heavily in debt, he goes against his better judgment- and that of his pretty neighbor Grace (Joey Lauren Adams)- and accepts an unsolicited offer from his strange neighbor Neely (Bud Cort) to courier a blue suitcase up to the desert truck stop of Baker, California. There, in the middle of nowhere, at a seedy motel in the shadow of The World's Largest Thermometer, he'll simply deliver the locked suitcase to a trucker called Cowboy (Sean Bean) and be paid twenty-seven thousand dollars in cold, hard cash. Seems like it’s easy money. But then John's given a loaded gun and told he must defend the blue suitcase with his life. On arrival in Baker, he discovers he's already missed the mysterious man and soon he's reluctantly mixed up with young local vixen Ruthie (Rachael Leigh Cook), her mother Stella (Darryl Hannah), Ruthie’s hot-headed jealous boyfriend Randy (Adam Beach) and paranoid, alien-obsessed locals. When special agent Banks (Kelsey Grammer) arrives at the local watering hole to question him about the murder and decapitation of his strange neighbor and hundreds of people recently gone missing, John realizes that he might be mixed up in something much more dangerous and bizarre than he ever imagined. Nothing is ever easy. Later that dark night, Cowboy violently appears and John finds himself caught somewhere between the surreal, the supernatural and the just plain weird. And when the final showdown begins, John is faced with a choice that could change his life forever. Has this whole town gone mad? Or are the loony locals, who John dismissed as being crazy, the only sane things about this strange parallel universe called The Big Empty? "
Dogville, The Big empty, some films i wouldn't mind seeing.

Oh Noble masses, Listen unto my utterings. No longer will thee be under the fierce rule of those who control ye. Nor will thy ways be tainted by that of the north, the agressors of the east, or the onslaught that hails from the south. Follow me, under my standards of pain, and technocracy and we shall rise above that which has pulled us down so far in our millennial trek forward. People I beg of you, to drop those affiliations with the corporate syndicates, and with me you shall find security, the fallacies of the masses will shelter you no more, as they cannot even hold their own fatal gasps of air. Can you ever open the eyes, and notice that we are only bombarded by their relentless assault unto our virgin flesh, our carnality stripped away by the only senses of dignity that we care to amass. Gather forth thy munitions for this is no longer a battle of wits, a battle of minds, it has come to what it is. A bloodless slaughter of millions, only in Blood shed is their forgiveness, for the next era, it will be stained with blood. Tomorrow we shall achieve greatness, though for tonight my Brethren, we feed.

Even when there is no interaction to create the event, by the vampire drawing the emotional energy, the apparent catalyst affect is still present. " So my manipulative nature...is coming out...are Vampires naturally sadistic? " A BLACK SWAN is a person, who is not a vampire, but loves, supports, and helps to protect those of us that are. There is an innate quality about the black swan that draws them to a vampire and a vampire to them. The opposite of this is the White Swan. Most often, a white swan is a religious person who feels the need to cause trouble. " Guess that would make Sarah ...a Black Swan " The second one, dubbed a 'leech' or 'parasite' within the community draws their energies by literally causing harm, mentally, emotionally and, in some cases, physically. The greater majority of the vampire community tries to distance themselves from this latter type of negative energy feeder. I must take the time to note for you, again, that MOST negative feeding vampires DO NOT create a chaos of negative energies to feed from. They simply draw from the already plentiful negative energies around the globe. " Anyone tell you..that I am NEVER the "most" of any group " Here are some of the common symptoms associated with vampirism... Migraines (from which I suffer), lethargy, insomnia (the reverse is true in some vampires... narcolepsy), depression, obsessive/compulsive disorder, hypersensitivity when it comes to emotions and emotional situations, hypersensitivity to sunlight (some have surmised that this is due to a vampire's innate talents to sense energies around them... and boy does the sun give off with the energies!!!), and last, but certainly not least, an undeniable 'hunger'/'thirst' for something other than normal foods... " Once again...I suffer from something. damnit....bloody Vampires....well i guess..I accept it. :) So let's see what Types of Vampire that I am. " Sanguinary The most widely known, but also the most widely misunderstood of the feeding types... Being falsely dubbed as 'psy-vamps on training wheels' or some other such nonsense, this is, of course, a blood feeder, a person who can pull their much needed energies from a physical source Psychic This type of vampire must feed on the ambient energies given off by all living entities, yet others, feed through a direct link. They must have this direct link in order to draw in their much needed energies. Pranic This type of vampire, though touch-based and physical, like the sanguinary when attaining the energies they need, derive their much needed energies from all of the dense prana energies given off by the body, including sexual contact. The difference between the Pranic and Sanguinary vampire is that a true sanguinary only draws their energy from the blood. Elemental Most feed on the elements of fire, water and wind, due to the difficulty most have when attempting to feed from the prime element of the Earth. They can tap into the 'para-elementals' of plant-life (IE trees, grass, bushes and house plants), but for some reason dirt, rocks and gemstones elude them. Empathic This feeder pulls their much needed energies from the emotional energies given off. Most of this is ambient emotional energy, however, some, as with psychic feeders, must establish a direct link in order to do this. Negative Most of these vampires feed on the ambient negative energies prevalent in the world around them each and every day. They hold an innate ability within themselves to flip this energy to a 'positive' feed for THEM. HOWEVER, there are negative feeders that will CREATE VERY negative situations in order to feed. These beings have been dubbed by many within the vampire community as 'psychic leeches' due to their obvious hazardous nature. Eclectic These vampires have awakened with the need for multiple sources of energy to maintain their already precarious balance of energies. This distinctive nature gives them some obvious advantages, like the capability of drawing from many sources instead of being locked into just one and having to adapt to others. The drawback to this, is that sooner or later, if they do not maintain a semblance of balance in these feeds, they, too, will feel the same side effects any other vampire would not feeding. Adaptive These vampires, through necessity, such as the lack of a donor for a sanguine vampire, have 'adapted' to other feedings in order to attain their much needed energies. However, there is a slight drawback. Adaptive feeders must return to their primary feed sooner or later. The primary feed implies the source of energy that was needed when the vampire first awakened. Well my daddy and I just saw Big Fish. I had been waiting a while to see it, and wanted to see it with him. So that followed through, made me really happy that we could spend some time together. I really don't know what turns life may have for me, you know what I am saying. I could go anywhere, do anything, be anyone I wanted to. My eyes are almost open again. I never really had thought about marriage before in my life. Never understood the pressure of it, what it meant or why. We just had a huge teaching on it at my church, and, I got to see an old friend get married. The first Marriage I had ever attended. It kind of changed me. I am thinking a little more about the future, and about how I will walk in the footsteps God intended, I had made a lot of mistakes, but I suppose it takes only so many detours before we realize, we are headed in the same direction, regardless of the fact that we have so much dear sweet, free will. I kind of miss and don't miss the paigns of highschool. I am glad they are over. I am sad to see though, that some of my best times however, were spent in the company of those that care not about me now. Janelle, why did I put so much emphasis on her, I wanted a friendship that would last. I suppose, I was wasting her time. How much changed between a party last year and this year. Both times I was alienated, last time I didn't know her, this time, she didn't know me. We always would miss eachother on some level. Any stability was way too temporary, I miss that girl's friendship. I suppose I could whine for all my life, or I could let her come back to me. Or vice versa. Either way, one of us will return to the other, if not. Hell has begun.

"only the good boys, can get what they are coming for....get what they came here for" I guess all these days apart from Janelle has taught me something. Friends are indeed just enemies with out the guts or means to stab you in the back. The first chance I got, they turned on me. One day I will show the world, one day. Kelsey, Augustus, Walter, Natasha, Saffron, Dave, Samantha, and let's not forget Dave. That's my crew...oh and Julie. That's my crew, we hang with eachother, and watch backs.

Well that would be a weird enough title for the night. Ok...how is it that a guy entering and exiting a trunk repeatedly not noticed. I mean come on, there we were in the Taco Bell parking lot, and no one noticed a guy jump into a trunk. There were like 30 people in the parking lot. Not to mention there we are in the Taco Bell, and like 5 girls walk in, then 2 more, then 3 more, then 2 more, then 5 more. They just piled in. There was also a large group of guys...unrelated though. We drive past in the mercedes, and there is like 10 people standing aroudn the open hood of this mustang, and we got the music pumping and Thumping. They look over at us and slam their hood, gettign all their underwear bunched up. We got to the house, and finally someone sees the kid bolt out of the trunk and he hits his brakes and backs up. Well we all kind of sat out there in front of Sam's place, swinging blades, knives and pipes. Dancing around like crazy. We kept on imitating Dodgeball, with that part "git in there deep." lol and all were dancing around like idiots...it was great. Somehow I ended up peeing on a block of two by fours, in some house being built...that was fairly humourous. Well then there came our trek down to Lacamas lake to see the hanging man tree. Well we looked up at the tree and like the rumour had said...it did look like a man being hung. Kinda creepy if you ask me. So we were on our way out, then we ended up helping someone find their cell phone THEN we left, amen.

That is the new post...Cool eh? I'm pretty stowked about it. Whee ...I wonder. Underoath is my fave band, know what I'm saying. No doubt about it. Hmmn, you think I should deck my saturn out like the Green Hornet's Car?

Well Julian (The Mexican), Allister, Sam(antha), Heather, Augustus, Walter, and I all went to see Dodgeball. That was one mighty obscure film. I enjoyed it nonetheless. I think Julian felt left out. On the way back, I had Sam laying in my lap, and heather under my left arm...it was good..it was good to be king...what do I mean IT IS GOOD to be king.

All I gotta say is that last night was ok. It was pretty tight when we got home. Saffron was cool as usual...The Hot Pizza was insanely awesome. Dave...he's always cool...as usual. and 45 minutes...dang she tried so hard...took her 45 minutes..

Well I went to the Zumiez couch Tour today...it was ok. Four Days Yesterday , could have been a lot better. they sounded alright..but you know....whatever. I was pretty instrumental to start a mosh pit...that was pretty insane...until ....Security..one word..security

It craeted such a surge of energy, you would not believe. It ran through my veins so fast. I got all tingly...all over. I don't understand it. It was so different inside. Before, it was like...I had full control...with guidance....and now it's speaking for me. I am told that ...what i said happened was a cop out. I am being held back. They don't know what happened. and they assumed it was like the last time. I understand. I never got the rush before. i am being yelled at over this. It was different. I had control. But it had to stop. it had to stop. Only one yell was at her. the others were to let out what was inside. It wasn't directed at anyone. The tingling. the irritation. it wouldn't stop. It wouldn't stop. I told her "It was different" Even though it was clear to me, that on the outside it was the same. it clearly looked the same. this time...on the inside, like I said before there was a surge of energy. I was looking forward to a bright summer, emotionally. First a small scuffle with someone. But now this. This energy...I don't know what it was. But it wasn't adrenaline, im used to that. Scare yourself, you will get adrenaline. Presence of God, that gives adrenaline. This was not that...this was something ...much different. I tried to explain to her...it was different....."it's just a cop out" it's what you say every time...it's different, it's different. The first two times...were the same..just me yelling without a cause...to get attention. although ...the time before this...was weird...I couldn't stop panting....I couldn't stop...the laughter, I couldn't stop the laughter, even though I wanted to. I tried to...it turned from anger, to fear to sadness. My parents don't understand. She yelled at me. I was just going to be silent..this time...all that crossed my mind "mom.....you said soft word calms....." then i stopped thinking. Extremeness of emotion pulls it. Life is so pointless now taht I am out of school. This time though.....I can't think of taking any more...that energy rush, the tingling, I couldn't take it. If I tell her she will have me committed, I don't know what happened. Augustus, no one...suffers from this. It's not rage...i know rage. That was not anger...that was fear, that was suffering, that was suffocation, that was exile, that was neglect. That was not anger. It was anything but anger. All I felt inside. Rejection, taunting, rejection, taunting, neglect, neglect, fear of lack of something, rejection. Everything I do is questioned now. I tried to tell her, I couldn't explain this energy to her...to say it..she would deny it. All I can do..is let them thing it was ...all the same. The last time was because of loss of trust. I learned not to react to that. I can't take it. I can't take it. Life is pointless now. I told her this wouldn't happen again....I guess I forgot. I had to back up...i was being cornered, she was taking it away from me. She blames it on the lack of my fatherly relationship. That doesn't matter to me. whether or not he is there. I see kids and there fathers, kids and there grandparents. I don't know what that means to me anymore. Why was it that at first when I played magic, I was into the green......then it shifted to black. Why did I go from life to death? what is it about darkness that attracted me. What does all this mean. I left in a good mood. Apart from the janelle fiasco I felt fine. I went to dinner, and enjoyed myself. came home, and was happy. I was sitting at my computer content, no issues. I noticed she was near me, so i turned off my headphones. She kept on tapping me like i wasn't listening, but i was listening, I was listening. kept on tapping, kept on nagging me....kept on calling me like i was ignoring, when I told her, and displayed that the music was off. Then for that, she kept on tapping me on the arm , hard....very hard...poking...poking. Then I told her to stop it, it was aggrivating me. she kept on doing it. I told her again. Then she yelled "WHY CAN"T YOU JUST STOP THAT"..... then it echoed "calm voices soothes anger"....i couldn't take it. Rejection of force of will. I took off my headphones forcibly and jumped back. I yelled, yelled again, yelled (the panting started) again....then it hit the energy hit. I hated it...I wanted it to stop, I wanted it to stop so bad. I had to yell, to drain it out. I couldn't take it. I couldn't take it. It pricked so hard all over my arms. It pricked so hard. I stopped yelling...even though it was the only thing that could stop it. and waited...panting...till thw prickling finished...it took about 2 minutes for it to stop. and that brings me to where I was told...that what I did was teh same I always did......they didn't know...and won't understand...that it was...the same outside...but inside...i was in agony....agony. Why do I live out these pains? it felt like true emotion. Can anyone explain?....i think I know.....but help would be nice.

by Beloved I made you promises, but i want them back I gave you everything, but you stabbed me in the back I finally figured out, that i can live without the pain i feel inside I've opened up my eyes, begun to realize i trusted way to many lies It's time to pick up the pieces now, am i falling down? Am i drowning out? Am i the only one who sees things this way? Well, i guess it goes to show Put me on my swing I can see the whole world from here and i feel so alive After all was said and done, more was said than done (missing out on me) Put me on my swing I can see the whole world from here and i feel so alive Your missing out on me, baby out on me Put me on my swing I can see the whole world from here and i feel so alive And i'm waiting, for you there For you to care I can see it in your eyes And i'm running, but not giving up Just giving in for now Cause i can't pretend it's all ok Missing ----------------------------------------------- That song....goes out to you Janelle...I want you to know that I never hated you throughout this ...and that your negative love....has no place in my heart.......Janelle....I still respect you as a friend....this is all so ridiculous.

This night I stood there...Sat there. Missing some things that I used to have in life. Will she ever look back? no...will she ever care...probably not. Will she ever know that I loved her as a friend enough to die for her....probably not..she probably didn't care. She would have seen me dying and said "oh, that's nice"....i miss her....i dont...but I might....help me someone..rain down mercy..
I suppose my ...frailties can be forgiven.

" pulse through this crystalline shines, i want to see my bloodied eyes, i cannot go with out my bionic drive, open my shattered eyes, We are the black Swan, We are the black Swan " -- Excerpt from the Black Swan's " Holy Knives, and Corrupt Fornication " I suppose as time passes on it blazes through us like a runaway train. In highschool there were some friendships I wanted to form..weirdly enough they just came in. Jerk maybe, friend maybe, driver perhaps, scholar proven....I am the Black Swan, the Deadened Spirit of the Deadened Creation. For I am what I am, and who I am....we are the Black Swan. If Janelle and Katrina ONLY knew what was inside of me..what i was birthign what I was thinking,....maybe they would try to stop me....too bad...that they don't care...*smirks*
Well I graduated from highschool on friday...yay with honors and validictorian, and as a washington scholar...yay

Well I bought Roswell today on DVD, all 968 minutes of it's raw radiant glory. I have to say that i am thoroughly pleased with the shows quality. It caught me offguard, but was a very nice surprise. I like it, kind of like my sister digs the OC, I dig this all the more. So it's looking pretty good, I plan to watch it with my sister...before I move. I want to spend time with her before I move, i really want her to know that I care about her, to know that her older brother isn't just the guy who lives upstairs, and sits in his room all day, or leaves without acknowledging her.

" Oh my Hell!? " -- Sean, at a Tourney Well that Tourney was weird. To sum it all up before I begin. I got beat by a 2/2 black creature, got swarmed over by rats. Then was beat the living day lights out of by over 1,000,000,000 damage from a Archbound Ravager if I understood correctly. That was weird off the hook. Pre-Tourney : I played up against this CRAZY guy. He had an ALL artifact deck. The first of like 4 decks, that were immune to my black deck. This made me so mad. So mad. Well let's put it this way. He defeated me with Ornithopters, say no more. It hurt too badly. Round 1 : I think I was cursed from the get go in this game. Get this. I got only 2 lands out that whole game, since he was playing black, and I found out RIGHT before the game that my "hand of death" cards were banned. grr. So because my terrors, and every card like that meant nothing, I was beaten off the hook, badly. I was smacked down on by some 2/2 creature black i remember, out of the mirrodin block somewhere. That sucked. 2 more games with this guy proved to be, raw insanity. Round 2 : This was against a man, known only as "Quinn". Why Quinn, I'm not quite sure. But to say it softly, it was the third deck that day immune to my black abilities. That was making me angry. First time he through, he kept on blowing everything up with one particular rat. Ravenous rats maybe ..or like crypt rats. So it made it hard for me to get a word in edgewise. Not to mention this dude was like...Total "house of pain" rapcore...lol so he was rapping as he was laying me to waste. One time of the 3 games, the middle game, I laid waste to him with the Hoar shade..that was cool.

Well I went to see Spiderman 2 today with my father (once again my dad and I spending time together). For that I hold no foul word at the film, I loved it. Personally I would have made Octavius far more, visceral in his destruction, and increased the gore ten fold over all. Though this was not the story of IG-88 nor, pitch black...it happened to be a film the whole family could see, and that was true they could. Nonetheless I guess this all comes down to relationships...like life and Algebra....got two things for you. One...a hey to Anna...lol the girl from back in the day. Hang in there ok? I believe in you...even though I can be a jerk, we gotta hang before I move...and second: (one second...gotta type all this) I gotta say this..then I will give the surprise. " Draw close to God, and he will draw to you ." My mother tells me that alot, and I finally agree. A lot of my friends claim that people changed me. I changed me, I tried to be someone that I couldn't be ie: not myself. But now I am back, I been thinking about who I am, where I came from. The Old Sean is back...screw the new one. People can't stand fronts anyways. So yeah the following is from...I guess Sean...: (still typing..hold up) here...the treat for anyone who has believed in me... "Hello All, I would like to thank Mr. Clements, Mr. Mullinex, Mrs. Kellar, and the rest of the staff of homelink for the support they’ve given me throughout the years, and all the nudges in the right direction that I have grown to appreciate. It’s been a long 4 years, and I guess I have to say that I am fairly sad that I have to see it go. I, as well as the reast of you attending, can probably think of at least one memorable occasion or occurrence or time you had while being here. I suppose you could say that I really came to love this place, from the first day I started here. Coming in from Canada, all that I really had to get used to, was the Warm weather, but overall it wasn’t hard to get accustomed to the school, and the people here. In the beginning I never really thought about how fast time would fly as the years passed by, but it kind of went on more quickly than any of us would have expected. My youth pastor once told me that high school would be the fasted most influential and integral part of my life. Complexities aside, I would have to agree with him on that much, I can barely remember what I ate for breakfast yesterday, let alone the color socks I was wearing. I never really planned for anything, never really expected anything too exciting out of high school, but I guess I was wrong. I earned a lot of friendships, met a lot of new people, learned a lot of new things. I guess in a way life is a little bit like algebra, with relationships being what it is founded upon. In Closing, I have a little excerpt from a book I was reading the other day: Don’t let anyone look down on you because of your youth; on the contrary, set an example in your speech, behavior, love, trust, and purity. " Fatherly relationships really help, hanging out with my Dad really brought me to understand God as a father figure. Thank you God, thank you Dad. I love you so much, thank you for bringing me and him closer together, and I am not afraid to stand by what I believe. What I took to you was so much more than an oath, and you mean more to me than a couple words, you are the air I breath, thank you, I love you, you will never forsake me, nor leave me behind, you are the air under my wings, i will follow you to the ends of the earth. You mentioned "ask and I will give the nations" Lord....thank you.

It would seem, glass and shiny orbs came up a whole lot in the old artwork. I was as I have said, more crystalline, then my current organic tendencies. Hmmn, I am seeing some Power Rangers, Mortal Kombat, and Classic Dinotopia Influences now. Estes's Brand model rockets, more Starwars.... Microsoft's Fury 3, Bill Nye, a Sea Lion. Starwars, 8-man, free willy the cartoon, Macross 2, macross. Star Fox.

urlLink Sometimes I wonder about my Influences. Looking through pictures I drew when I was younger I see obvious evidence of my inspirations. In some you can see my Haida Indian influence, from when I was younger in "Sciene Humaines" with Professeur Catherine Beron. And then in others you can see influences of Star Wars, and Jurassic Park. Lately it's been Clive Barker, Tim Burton, and Picasso. I would have loved to have met Picasso, the troubled genius, I wonder if he was a man of God. As I look further I see influences, of Bomberman, of Panic Bomber, when I got my first Video Game Console, my Virtual Boy, which I still have ;). Then influences of Megaman 4, which I loved back in the day.
